74 /*===================
75 PM_StartTorsoAnim
76 ===================*/
77 void PM_StartTorsoAnim(int anim){
78  pm->ps->torsoAnim = ((pm->ps->torsoAnim & ANIM_TOGGLEBIT)^ ANIM_TOGGLEBIT) | anim;
79 }
80 void PM_StartLegsAnim(int anim){
81  if((pm->ps->bitFlags & isGuiding) && (pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ANY) && !(VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity)== 0.0f)){return;}
82  pm->ps->legsAnim = ((pm->ps->legsAnim & ANIM_TOGGLEBIT)^ ANIM_TOGGLEBIT ) | anim;
83 }
84 
85 void PM_ContinueLegsAnim(int anim){
86  if((pm->ps->bitFlags & isGuiding) && (pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ANY) && !(VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity)== 0.0f)){return;}
87  if((pm->ps->legsAnim & ~ANIM_TOGGLEBIT)== anim){
88  return;
89  }
90  PM_StartLegsAnim(anim );
91 }
92 
93 void PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(int anim){
94  if((pm->ps->torsoAnim & ~ANIM_TOGGLEBIT)== anim){
95  return;
96  }
97  PM_StartTorsoAnim(anim );
98 }
99 void PM_ForceTorsoAnim(int anim){
100  pm->ps->torsoTimer = 0;
101  PM_StartTorsoAnim(anim);
102 }
103 void PM_ForceLegsAnim(int anim){
104  if((pm->ps->bitFlags & isGuiding) && (pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ANY) && !(VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity)== 0.0f)){return;}
105  pm->ps->legsTimer = 0;
106  PM_StartLegsAnim(anim );
107 }
108 /*===================
109 FREEZE
110 ===================*/
111 void PM_Freeze(void){
112  if(pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] > 0){
113  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] -= pml.msec;
114  VectorClear(pm->ps->velocity);
115  if(pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze]<0){pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 0;}
116  }
117 }
118 /*================
119 IMPEDE
120 ================*/
121 void PM_Impede(void){
122  if(pm->ps->timers[tmImpede] > 0){
123  pm->ps->timers[tmImpede] -= pml.msec;
124  if(pm->ps->timers[tmImpede] <= 0){pm->ps->timers[tmImpede] = 0;}
125  VectorClear(pm->ps->velocity);
126  PM_StopDirections();
127  PM_StopZanzoken();
128  }
129 }
130 /*================
131 RIDE
132 ================*/
133 void PM_Ride(void){
134  if(pm->ps->states & isRiding){
135  VectorClear(pm->ps->velocity);
136  //PM_StopDirections();
137  PM_StopZanzoken();
138  pm->cmd.forwardmove = -1;
139  }
140 }
141 /*================
142 Burn
143 ================*/
144 void PM_Burn(void){
145  if(pm->ps->states & isBurning){
146  VectorClear(pm->ps->velocity);
147  PM_StopDirections();
148  PM_StopZanzoken();
149  }
150 }

158  }
159 }

163 void PM_CheckLoopingSound(void){
164  if(pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] ||
165  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeCharge] != 0 ||
166  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] ||
167  pm->ps->bitFlags & usingMelee ||
168  pm->ps->bitFlags & isUnconcious ||
169  pm->ps->bitFlags & isCrashed ||
170  pm->ps->bitFlags & isDead){
171  PM_AddEvent(EV_STOPLOOPINGSOUND);
172  }
173 }
174 /*===================
175 KNOCKBACK
176 ===================*/
177 void PM_StopKnockback(void){
178  pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] = 0;
179  pm->ps->knockBackDirection = 0;
180 }
181 void PM_StopDirections(void){
182  pm->cmd.forwardmove = 0;
183  pm->cmd.upmove = 0;
184  pm->cmd.rightmove = 0;
185 }
186 void PM_CheckKnockback(void){
187  vec3_t pre_vel,post_vel,wishvel,wishdir,direction;
188  qboolean vertical;
189  float scale,wishspeed;
190  int i,speed;
191  vertical = qfalse;
192  //if(pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze]){return;}
193  if(pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] < 0){
194  pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] += pml.msec;
195  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_KNOCKBACK_RECOVER_2);
196  if(pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] >= 0){
197  pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] = 0;
198  }
199  }
200  if(pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] > 0){
201  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_KNOCKBACK);
202  pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] -= pml.msec;
203  PM_StopDirections();
204  VectorScale(pml.forward,-1,direction);
205  if(pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] > 0){
206  PM_WeaponRelease();
207  if(pm->ps->knockBackDirection == 1){
208  VectorCopy(pml.up,direction);
209  vertical = qtrue;
210  pm->cmd.upmove = 127;
211  }
212  else if(pm->ps->knockBackDirection == 2){
213  VectorScale(pml.up,-1.0,direction);
214  vertical = qtrue;
215  pm->cmd.upmove = -127;
216  }
217  else if(pm->ps->knockBackDirection == 3){
218  VectorScale(pml.right,-1.0,direction);
219  pm->cmd.rightmove = -127;
220  }
221  else if(pm->ps->knockBackDirection == 4){
222  VectorCopy(pml.right,direction);
223  pm->cmd.rightmove = 127;
224  }
225  else if(pm->ps->knockBackDirection == 5){
226  VectorScale(pml.forward,-1.0,direction);
227  pm->cmd.forwardmove = -127;
228  }
229  else if(pm->ps->knockBackDirection == 6){
230  VectorCopy(pml.forward,direction);
231  pm->cmd.forwardmove = 127;
232  }
233  }
234  else{
235  pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] = 0;
236  }
237  scale = PM_CmdScale(&pm->cmd);
238  for(i=0;i<3;i++){
239  wishvel[i] = scale * pml.forward[i] * pm->cmd.forwardmove + scale * pml.right[i] * pm->cmd.rightmove + scale * pml.up[i] * pm->cmd.upmove;
240  }
241  VectorCopy(wishvel,wishdir);
242  wishspeed = VectorNormalize(wishdir);
243  PM_Accelerate(wishdir,wishspeed,50);
244  VectorNormalize(pm->ps->velocity);
245  VectorCopy(pm->ps->velocity,pre_vel);
246  speed = pm->ps->powerups[PW_KNOCKBACK_SPEED];
247  if((pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ALT_ATTACK) && (pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] < 4000)){
248  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += ((float)pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] / 5000.0) * (0.2 * pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue]);
249  pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] = -500;
250  PM_AddEvent(EV_AIRBRAKE);
251  speed = 0;
252  }
253  else if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK){
254  pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] -= pml.msec;
255  //PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_KNOCKBACK_RECOVER_1);
256  speed /= 2;
257  }
258  VectorScale(pm->ps->velocity,speed,pm->ps->velocity);
259  PM_StepSlideMove(qfalse);
260  VectorNormalize2(pm->ps->velocity,post_vel);
261  if(PM_CheckDirection(direction,qfalse)){PM_Crash(vertical);}
262  }
263 }
264 void PM_Crash(qboolean vertical){
265  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & isCrashed){return;}
266  pm->ps->powerLevel[plDamageGeneric] = pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar ? VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity) * 0.03 : VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity) * 0.3;
267  pm->ps->timers[tmCrash] = vertical ? -2500 : 2500;
268  pm->ps->bitFlags |= isCrashed;
269  PM_AddEvent(EV_CRASH);
270  PM_StopSoar();
271  PM_StopKnockback();
272 }

274 TALK
275 ===================*/
276 void PM_CheckTalk(void){
277  if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_TALK){pm->ps->eFlags |= EF_TALK;}
278  else{pm->ps->eFlags &= ~EF_TALK;}
279  if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_TALK){
280  pm->cmd.buttons = BUTTON_TALK;
281  }
282 }
283 /*===============
284 ZANZOKEN
285 ===============*/
286 void PM_StopZanzoken(void){
287  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingZanzoken || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingQuickZanzoken){
288  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingZanzoken;
289  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingQuickZanzoken;
290  PM_AddEvent(EV_ZANZOKEN_END);
291  VectorClear(pm->ps->velocity);
292  }
293  pm->ps->timers[tmZanzoken] = -500;
294 }
295 void PM_CheckZanzoken(void){
296  vec3_t pre_vel, post_vel,minSize,maxSize,forward,up,end;
297  float stepCost;
298  int speed,cost,transfer;
299  trace_t trace;
300  if(!(pm->ps->options & canZanzoken)){return;}
301  if(pm->ps->timers[tmZanzoken] < 0){
302  pm->ps->timers[tmZanzoken] += pml.msec;
303  if(pm->ps->timers[tmZanzoken] >= 0){pm->ps->timers[tmZanzoken] = 0;}
304  else{return;}
305  }
306  if((pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] <= pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.15)){
307  PM_StopZanzoken();
308  return;
309  }
310  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar || pm->ps->bitFlags & isPreparing || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingMelee){return;}
311  if(pm->ps->timers[tmZanzoken] > 0){
312  stepCost = ((pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.09) * pm->ps->baseStats[stZanzokenCost]) / (pm->ps->timers[tmZanzoken] / 50.0);
313  speed = (pm->ps->powerLevel[plCurrent] / 13.1) + (pm->ps->baseStats[stZanzokenSpeed] * 4000);
314  pm->ps->measureTimers[mtZanzokenDistance] -= pml.msec;
315  if(pm->ps->measureTimers[mtZanzokenDistance] < 0 || (!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_TELEPORT) && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingQuickZanzoken))){
316  PM_StopZanzoken();
317  }
318  else{
319  pm->ps->measureTimers[mtZanzoken] += pml.msec;
320  while(pm->ps->measureTimers[mtZanzoken] > 50){
321  pm->ps->buffers[bfZanzokenCost] += stepCost;
322  if(pm->ps->buffers[bfZanzokenCost] > 1 && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingQuickZanzoken)){
323  transfer = (int)pm->ps->buffers[bfZanzokenCost];
324  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += transfer;
325  pm->ps->buffers[bfZanzokenCost] -= transfer;
326  }
327  pm->ps->measureTimers[mtZanzoken] -= 50;
328  }
329  VectorNormalize(pm->ps->velocity);
330  VectorCopy(pm->ps->velocity,pre_vel);
331  if(pm->ps->lockedTarget > 0){speed *= 1.5;}
332  VectorScale(pm->ps->velocity,speed,pm->ps->velocity);
333  VectorNormalize2(pm->ps->velocity,post_vel);
334  }
335  }
336  else if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_TELEPORT){
337  PM_StopDash();
338  pm->ps->bitFlags |= usingZanzoken;
339  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingQuickZanzoken;
340  pm->ps->timers[tmZanzoken] = (pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] * 0.01) + (pm->ps->baseStats[stZanzokenDistance] * 500);
341  pm->ps->measureTimers[mtZanzokenDistance] = pm->ps->timers[tmZanzoken];
342  cost = (pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.03) * pm->ps->baseStats[stZanzokenCost];
343  if(pm->ps->lockedTarget > 0){cost *= 0.8;}
344  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingJump){cost *= 0.4;}
345  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += cost;
346  PM_AddEvent(EV_ZANZOKEN_START);
347  }
348  else if(!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_BOOST) && !(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_POWERLEVEL) && (pm->ps->sequenceTimers[15]%10 == 2 || pm->ps->sequenceTimers[16]%10 == 2 || pm->ps->sequenceTimers[17]%10 == 2 ||
349  pm->ps->sequenceTimers[18]%10 == 2 || pm->ps->sequenceTimers[19]%10 == 2 || pm->ps->sequenceTimers[20]%10 == 2)){
350  PM_StopDash();
351  pm->ps->bitFlags |= usingZanzoken;
352  pm->ps->bitFlags |= usingQuickZanzoken;
353  pm->ps->timers[tmZanzoken] = pm->ps->baseStats[stZanzokenQuickDistance] * 500;
354  pm->ps->measureTimers[mtZanzokenDistance] = pm->ps->timers[tmZanzoken];
355  cost = (pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.01) * pm->ps->baseStats[stZanzokenQuickCost];
356  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += cost;
357  PM_AddEvent(EV_ZANZOKEN_START);
358 
359  }
360 
361 
362 }
363 /*===============
364 POWER LEVEL
365 ===============*/
366 void PM_UsePowerLevel(){
367  int newValue,amount,stat,useType,limit;
368  useType = 0;
369  limit = pm->ps->powerLevel[plLimit];
370  while(useType < 4){
371  stat = useType == 1 ? pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] : pm->ps->powerLevel[plCurrent];
372  stat = useType == 2 ? pm->ps->powerLevel[plHealth] : stat;
373  stat = useType == 3 ? pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] : stat;
374  amount = useType == 1 ? pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] : pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseCurrent];
375  amount = useType == 2 ? pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseHealth] : amount;
376  amount = useType == 3 ? pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseMaximum] : amount;
377  newValue = (stat - amount) > limit ? limit : stat - amount;
378  if(newValue <= 0 && useType == 0 && pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] > 0){
379  pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] -= (amount * 1.5);
380  pm->ps->powerLevel[plCurrent] = 1;
381  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseCurrent] = 0;
382  return;
383  }
384  newValue = newValue < -limit ? -limit : newValue;
385  if(useType == 1){
386  pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] = newValue;
387  if(pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] < 0){
388  amount = (pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue]*-1)*0.75;
389  if(pm->ps->powerLevel[plHealth] - amount <= 0){
390  amount = pm->ps->powerLevel[plHealth] - 1;
391  }
392  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseHealth] += amount;
393  pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] = 0;
394  }
395  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] = 0;
396  }
397  else if(useType == 2){
398  pm->ps->powerLevel[plHealth] = newValue;
399  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseHealth] = 0;
400  }
401  else if(useType == 3){
402  pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] = newValue;
403  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseMaximum] = 0;
404  }
405  else{
406  pm->ps->powerLevel[plCurrent] = newValue;
407  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseCurrent] = 0;
408  }
409  useType += 1;
410  }
411 }
412 void PM_BurnPowerLevel(){
413  float percent;
414  int defense;
415  int burn,initial;
416  int newValue;
417  int burnType;
418  int limit;
419  limit = pm->ps->powerLevel[plLimit];
420  burnType = 0;
421  if(pm->ps->powerLevel[plDamageFromMelee] || pm->ps->powerLevel[plDamageFromEnergy] || pm->ps->powerLevel[plDamageGeneric] || pm->ps->states & causedDamage){
422  pm->ps->bitFlags |= isUnsafe;
423  pm->ps->states &= ~causedDamage;
424  pm->ps->timers[tmSafe] = 0;
425  }
426  else if(pm->ps->timers[tmSafe] > 10000){
427  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isUnsafe;
428  }
429  pm->ps->timers[tmSafe] += pml.msec;
430  while(burnType < 3){
431  burn = burnType == 1 ? pm->ps->powerLevel[plDamageFromMelee] : pm->ps->powerLevel[plDamageFromEnergy];
432  burn = burnType == 2 ? pm->ps->powerLevel[plDamageGeneric] : burn;
433  if(!burn){
434  burnType += 1;
435  continue;
436  }
437  defense = burnType == 1 ? pm->ps->baseStats[stDefenseMelee] : pm->ps->baseStats[stDefenseEnergy];
438  defense = pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBlock ? defense * 2.0 : defense;
439  defense = pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBallFlip ? defense * 1.5 : defense;
440  defense = pm->ps->bitFlags & atopGround ? defense * 1.1 : defense;
441  defense = (pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_WALKING) && pm->ps->bitFlags & atopGround ? defense * 1.5 : defense;
442  initial = burn;
443  percent = 1.0 - ((float)pm->ps->powerLevel[plCurrent] / (float)pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum]);
444  burn -= (int)(((float)pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] * 0.1) * defense);
445  if(burnType != 2){
446  pm->ps->powerLevel[plHealthPool] += burn * 0.5;
447  pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximumPool] += burn * 0.7;
448  }
449  if(pm->ps->powerLevel[plHealthPool] > limit){pm->ps->powerLevel[plHealthPool] = limit;}
450  if(pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximumPool] > limit){pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximumPool] = limit;}
451  if(burn > 0){
452  newValue = pm->ps->powerLevel[plHealth] - burn;
453  if(newValue > limit){newValue = limit;}
454  else if(newValue < 0){newValue = 0;}
455  pm->ps->powerLevel[plHealth] = newValue;
456  if(burnType != 2){
457  newValue = pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] + (initial * 0.7f * percent);
458  if(newValue > pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 1.25f){
459  newValue = pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 1.25f;
460  }
461  if(newValue > limit){newValue = limit;}
462  else if(newValue < 0){newValue = 0;}
463  pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] = newValue;
464  }
465  }
466  if(burnType == 0){pm->ps->powerLevel[plDamageFromEnergy] = 0;}
467  else if(burnType == 1){pm->ps->powerLevel[plDamageFromMelee] = 0;}
468  else if(burnType == 2){pm->ps->powerLevel[plDamageGeneric] = 0;}
469  burnType += 1;
470  }
471 }
472 void PM_CheckCrash(void){
473  if(pm->ps->timers[tmCrash] > 0){
474  pm->ps->timers[tmCrash] -= pml.msec;
475  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_KNOCKBACK_HIT_WALL);
476  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_KNOCKBACK_HIT_WALL);
477  if(pm->ps->timers[tmCrash] < 0){
478  pm->ps->powerups[PW_STATE] = -1;
479  pm->ps->timers[tmCrash] = 0;
480  }
481  }
482  else if(pm->ps->timers[tmCrash] < 0){
483  pm->ps->timers[tmCrash] += pml.msec;
484  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_DEATH_AIR_LAND);
485  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DEATH_AIR_LAND);
486  if(pm->ps->timers[tmCrash] > 0){
487  pm->ps->powerups[PW_STATE] = -1;
488  pm->ps->timers[tmCrash] = 0;
489  }
490  }
491 }
492 void PM_CheckStatus(void){
493  if(pm->ps->persistant[PERS_TEAM] == TEAM_SPECTATOR){return;}
494  if(pm->ps->powerLevel[plHealth] <= 0){
495  if(pm->ps->powerups[PW_STATE] != -2){
496  pm->ps->bitFlags |= isDead;
497  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isStruggling;
498  pm->ps->powerups[PW_STATE] = -2;
499  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 0;
500 
501  PM_StopMovement();
502  PM_StopFlight();
503  PM_WeaponRelease();
504  PM_AddEvent(EV_DEATH);
505  }
506  else{
507  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & atopGround){
508  if(!(pm->ps->bitFlags & nearGround)){
509  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_DEATH_AIR_LAND);
510  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DEATH_AIR_LAND);
511  }
512  else{
513  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_DEATH_GROUND);
514  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DEATH_GROUND);
515  }
516  }
517  else{
518  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_DEATH_AIR);
519  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DEATH_AIR);
520  }
521  }
522  }
523  /*else if(pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] <= 0){
524  if(pm->ps->powerups[PW_STATE] != -1){
525  pm->ps->bitFlags |= isUnconcious;
526  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isStruggling;
527  pm->ps->powerups[PW_STATE] = -1;
528  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 0;
529  pm->ps->powerLevel[plCurrent] = 1;
530  PM_StopMovement();
531  PM_StopFlight();
532  PM_StopBoost();
533  PM_WeaponRelease();
534  PM_AddEvent(EV_UNCONCIOUS);
535  if(pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] > -2500){
536  pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] = -2500;
537  }
538  }
539  else{
540  pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] += pml.msec / 2;
541  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & atopGround){
542  if(!(pm->ps->bitFlags & nearGround)){
543  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_DEATH_AIR_LAND);
544  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DEATH_AIR_LAND);
545  }
546  else{
547  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_DEATH_GROUND);
548  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DEATH_GROUND);
549  }
550  }
551  else{
552  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_DEATH_AIR);
553  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DEATH_AIR);
554  }
555  }
556  }*/
557  else{
558  if(pm->ps->powerups[PW_STATE] == -1){
559  if(pm->ps->timers[tmRecover] <= 0){pm->ps->timers[tmRecover] = 2000;}
560  pm->ps->timers[tmRecover] -= pml.msec;
561  if(pm->ps->timers[tmRecover] <= 0){
562  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isUnconcious;
563  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isCrashed;
564  pm->ps->powerups[PW_STATE] = 0;
565  }
566  else if(pm->ps->bitFlags & isCrashed && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & atopGround)){
567  PM_StopMovement();
568  PM_StartFlight();
569  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_KNOCKBACK_HIT_WALL);
570  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_KNOCKBACK_HIT_WALL);
571  return;
572  }
573  else{
574  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_FLOOR_RECOVER);
575  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_FLOOR_RECOVER);
576  return;
577  }
578  }
579  pm->ps->powerups[PW_STATE] = 0;
580  }
581 }

583 void PM_CheckSpecificSequences(signed char buttonValue, int index){
584  int oppositeButtonIndex = index+1;
585  int time = pm->cmd.serverTime / 10;
586  int tapTime = 150;
587  int current = 0;
588  int oppositeButtonCurrent = 0;
589  int sequenceStatus = 0;
590  int sequenceTime = 0;
591  int oppositeButtonSequenceStatus = 0;
592  int oppositeButtonSequenceTime = 0;
593  current = pm->ps->sequenceTimers[index];
594  oppositeButtonCurrent = pm->ps->sequenceTimers[oppositeButtonIndex];
595  sequenceStatus = current%10;
596  sequenceTime = current/10;
597  oppositeButtonSequenceStatus = oppositeButtonCurrent%10;
598  oppositeButtonSequenceTime = oppositeButtonCurrent/10;
599  if(buttonValue > 0){
600  if(sequenceStatus == 0){
601  sequenceStatus = ((time - sequenceTime)*10) <= tapTime ? 2 : 1;
602  sequenceTime = time;
603  }
604  else{
605  sequenceStatus = 1;
606  }
607  }
608  else{
609  sequenceStatus = 0;
610  }
611  if(buttonValue < 0){
612  if(oppositeButtonSequenceStatus == 0){
613  oppositeButtonSequenceStatus = ((time - oppositeButtonSequenceTime)*10) <= tapTime ? 2 : 1;
614  oppositeButtonSequenceTime = time;
615  }
616  else{
617  oppositeButtonSequenceStatus = 1;
618  }
619  }
620  else{
621  oppositeButtonSequenceStatus = 0;
622  }
623  pm->ps->sequenceTimers[oppositeButtonIndex] = (oppositeButtonSequenceTime * 10) + oppositeButtonSequenceStatus;
624  pm->ps->sequenceTimers[index] = (sequenceTime * 10) + sequenceStatus;
625 }
626 
627 void PM_CheckSequences(void){
628  int index;
629  int buttonIndex = 1;
630  int time = pm->cmd.serverTime / 10;
631  int tapTime = 500;
632  int current = 0;
633  int sequenceStatus = 0;
634  int sequenceTime = 0;
635  for(index = 0;index < 15;++index){
636  current = pm->ps->sequenceTimers[index];
637  sequenceStatus = current%10;
638  sequenceTime = current/10;
639  if(pm->cmd.buttons & buttonIndex){
640  if(sequenceStatus == 0){
641  sequenceStatus = ((time - sequenceTime)*10) <= tapTime ? 2 : 1;
642  sequenceTime = time;
643  }
644  else{
645  sequenceStatus = 1;
646  }
647  }
648  else{
649  sequenceStatus = 0;
650  }
651  pm->ps->sequenceTimers[index] = (sequenceTime * 10) + sequenceStatus;
652  buttonIndex *= 2;
653  }
654  PM_CheckSpecificSequences(pm->cmd.forwardmove, index);
655  PM_CheckSpecificSequences(pm->cmd.rightmove, index+2);
656  PM_CheckSpecificSequences(pm->cmd.upmove, index+4);
657 }

659 void PM_CheckContextOperations(void)
660 {
661  //Transforming operations
662  if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_POWERLEVEL){
663  if(pm->cmd.weapon - 1 != pm->ps->powerLevel[plTierCurrent])
664  {
665  pm->ps->powerLevel[plTierSelectionMode] = 0;
666  pm->cmd.tier = pm->cmd.weapon- 1;
667  pm->cmd.weapon = pm->ps->weapon;
668  pm->cmd.tierSelectionMode = pm->cmd.weaponSelectionMode;
669  pm->cmd.weaponSelectionMode = 0;
670  }
671  else if(pm->cmd.weaponSelectionMode > 0)
672  {
673  pm->cmd.tierSelectionMode = pm->cmd.weaponSelectionMode;
674  pm->cmd.weaponSelectionMode = 0;
675  }
676  }

679 qboolean PM_CheckTransform(void){
680  if(!(pm->ps->options & canTransform)){
681  pm->ps->powerLevel[plTierChanged] = 1;
682  return qfalse;
683  }
684 
685  pm->ps->powerLevel[plTierDesired] = pm->cmd.tier;
686  pm->ps->powerLevel[plTierSelectionMode] = pm->cmd.tierSelectionMode;
687 
688  pm->ps->timers[tmUpdateTier] += pml.msec;
689  if(pm->ps->timers[tmUpdateTier] > 300){
690  pm->ps->timers[tmUpdateTier] = 0;
691  if(pm->ps->stats[stTransformState] == -1){PM_AddEvent(EV_TIERDOWN);}
692  else if(pm->ps->stats[stTransformState] == 1){PM_AddEvent(EV_TIERUP);}
693  else if(pm->ps->stats[stTransformState] == 2){PM_AddEvent(EV_TIERUP_FIRST);}
694  pm->ps->stats[stTransformState] = 0;
695  }
696 
697  if(pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] == 1){
698  pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] = -100;
699  PM_AddEvent(EV_SYNCTIER);
700  return qtrue;
701  }
702  else if(pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] == -1){
703  pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] = -100;
704  PM_AddEvent(EV_SYNCTIER);
705  return qtrue;
706  }
707  else if(pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] > 0){
708  PM_StopDirections();
709  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & isTransforming){
710  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_TRANS_UP);
711  pm->ps->eFlags |= EF_AURA;
712  pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] -= pml.msec;
713  if(pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] <= 0){pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] = 0;}
714  PM_StopMovement();
715  }
716  else{
717  pm->ps->bitFlags |= isTransforming;
718  PM_AddEvent(EV_SYNCTIER);
719  return qtrue;
720  }
721  }
722  else if(pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] < 0){
723  if(pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] > 100 || pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] < -100){PM_StopDirections();}
724  pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] += pml.msec;
725  if(pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] >= -1){
726  pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] = 0;
727  }
728  }
729  if(pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] == 0){
730  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isTransforming;
731  }
732  return qfalse;
733 }
734 void PM_CheckPowerLevel(void){
735  int plSpeed,amount,limit;
736  int *timers,*powerLevel;
737  float lower,raise,recovery;
738  float statScale;
739  float fatigueScale;
740  float check;
741  static float fractionPool = 0;
742  int pushLimit;
743  int newValue;
744  int idleScale;
745  int smaller;
746  timers = pm->ps->timers;
747  powerLevel = pm->ps->powerLevel;
748  timers[tmPowerAuto] += pml.msec;
749  limit = powerLevel[plLimit];
750  while(timers[tmPowerAuto] >= 100){
751  timers[tmPowerAuto] -= 100;
752  idleScale = (!pm->cmd.forwardmove && !pm->cmd.rightmove && !pm->cmd.upmove) ? 2.8 : 1;
753  statScale = 1.0 - ((float)powerLevel[plCurrent] / (float)powerLevel[plMaximum]);
754  if(statScale > 0.75){statScale = 0.75;}
755  if(statScale < 0.25){statScale = 0.25;}
756  fatigueScale = (float)powerLevel[plFatigue] / (float)powerLevel[plMaximum];
757  recovery = (float)powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.01 * idleScale;
758  recovery *= statScale;
759  recovery *= fatigueScale < 0.15 ? 0.15 : fatigueScale;
760  recovery *= pm->ps->baseStats[stFatigueRecovery];
761  if(recovery < 1){recovery = 1;}
762  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingAlter || pm->ps->bitFlags & isStruggling || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar
763  || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingJump || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingZanzoken
764  || pm->ps->bitFlags & isBreakingLimit || pm->ps->weaponstate >= WEAPON_GUIDING){recovery = 0;}
765  /*if(powerLevel[plCurrent] > powerLevel[plFatigue]){
766  newValue = powerLevel[plCurrent] - (powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.005);
767  powerLevel[plCurrent] = (powerLevel[plCurrent] - newValue >= 0) ? newValue : 0;
768  }*/
769  newValue = powerLevel[plCurrent] + powerLevel[plDrainCurrent];
770  if(newValue < powerLevel[plMaximum] && newValue > 0){powerLevel[plCurrent] = newValue;}
771  newValue = powerLevel[plFatigue] + powerLevel[plDrainFatigue];
772  if(newValue < powerLevel[plMaximum]){powerLevel[plFatigue] = newValue;}
773  newValue = powerLevel[plHealth] + powerLevel[plDrainHealth];
774  if(newValue < powerLevel[plMaximum]){powerLevel[plHealth] = newValue;}
775  newValue = powerLevel[plMaximum] + powerLevel[plDrainMaximum];
776  if(newValue < limit && newValue > 0){powerLevel[plMaximum] = newValue;}
777  if(powerLevel[plFatigue] + recovery < powerLevel[plMaximum]){
778  powerLevel[plFatigue] += recovery;
779  }
780  else{
781  powerLevel[plFatigue] = powerLevel[plMaximum];
782  }
783  }
784  if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_POWERLEVEL && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar)){
785  qboolean usableAlter;
786  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~keyTierDown;
787  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~keyTierUp;
788  usableAlter = qtrue;
789  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingJump && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & underWater)){
790  PM_StartFlight();
791  PM_SuddenBrake();
792  PM_StopDash();
793  PM_StopJump();
794  PM_StopJumpChain();
795  }
796  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost || pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] < 0 ||
797  pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_CHARGING || pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_ALTCHARGING){
798  usableAlter = qfalse;
799  }
800  if(usableAlter && pm->cmd.upmove < 0){
801  PM_StopFlight();
802  PM_ForceLegsAnim(ANIM_FLY_DOWN);
803  }
804  if(pm->cmd.forwardmove > 0){
805  pm->ps->bitFlags |= keyTierUp;
806  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingAlter;
807  }
808  else if(pm->cmd.forwardmove < 0){
809  pm->ps->bitFlags |= keyTierDown;
810  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingAlter;
811  }
812  else if(usableAlter && pm->ps->options & canAlter && pm->cmd.rightmove < 0){
813  pm->ps->eFlags &= ~EF_AURA;
814  lower = powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.01;
815  powerLevel[plCurrent] = (powerLevel[plCurrent] - lower > 1) ? powerLevel[plCurrent] - lower : 1;
816  if(!(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingAlter)){PM_AddEvent(EV_ALTERDOWN_START);}
817  pm->ps->bitFlags |= usingAlter;
818  }
819  else if(usableAlter && pm->ps->options & canAlter && (pm->cmd.rightmove > 0)){
820  pm->ps->eFlags |= EF_AURA;
821  timers[tmPowerRaise] += pml.msec;
822  while(timers[tmPowerRaise] >= 25){
823  if(!pm->ps->options & canBreakLimit){break;}
824  timers[tmPowerRaise] -= 25;
825  raise = powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.009;
826  if(powerLevel[plCurrent] > powerLevel[plFatigue]){raise *= 0.6;}
827  if(raise < 1){raise = 1;}
828  newValue = powerLevel[plCurrent] + raise;
829  if(newValue > powerLevel[plMaximum]){newValue = powerLevel[plMaximum];}
830  if(newValue > limit){newValue = limit;}
831  powerLevel[plCurrent] = newValue;
832  if(powerLevel[plCurrent] == powerLevel[plMaximum]){
833  if(!(pm->ps->bitFlags & isBreakingLimit)){PM_AddEvent(EV_POWERINGUP_START);}
834  pm->ps->bitFlags |= isBreakingLimit;
835  fractionPool += pm->ps->breakLimitRate;
836  pushLimit = powerLevel[plCurrent] + (int)fractionPool;
837  if(pushLimit > limit){pushLimit = limit;}
838  if((pm->ps->options & canOverheal) && powerLevel[plHealth] < powerLevel[plMaximum] && powerLevel[plHealthPool] > 0){
839  smaller = (powerLevel[plHealth] + raise * 0.3) < powerLevel[plMaximum] ? (raise * 0.3) : (powerLevel[plMaximum] - powerLevel[plHealth]);
840  if(powerLevel[plHealthPool] > smaller){
841  powerLevel[plHealth] += smaller;
842  powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += smaller * 0.84;
843  powerLevel[plHealthPool] -= smaller;
844  }
845  else{
846  powerLevel[plHealth] += powerLevel[plHealthPool];
847  powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += powerLevel[plHealthPool] * 0.84;
848  powerLevel[plHealthPool] = 0;
849  }
850  if(powerLevel[plHealthPool] < 0){powerLevel[plHealthPool] = 0;}
851  }
852  if(powerLevel[plMaximumPool] > 0){
853  powerLevel[plHealth] += pushLimit - powerLevel[plMaximum];
854  powerLevel[plCurrent] = powerLevel[plMaximum] = pushLimit;
855  }
856  else{
857  powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += raise * 0.75;
858  }
859  powerLevel[plMaximumPool] -= raise * 0.3 * (int)fractionPool;
860  if(powerLevel[plMaximumPool] < 0){powerLevel[plMaximumPool] = 0;}
861  fractionPool -= (int)fractionPool;
862  }
863  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & isBreakingLimit){
864  if(powerLevel[plCurrent] < ((float)powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.95)){
865  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isBreakingLimit;
866  }
867  }
868  }
869  if(!(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingAlter)){PM_AddEvent(EV_ALTERUP_START);}
870  pm->ps->bitFlags |= usingAlter;
871  }
872  else{
873  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingAlter;
874  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isBreakingLimit;
875  }
876  PM_StopDirections();
877  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_IDLE);
878  }
879  else{
880  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingAlter;
881  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~keyTierDown;
882  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~keyTierUp;
883  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isBreakingLimit;
884  }
885 }

891  PM_AddEvent(EV_HOVER);

895  pm->ps->states |= isDashing;

897  }
898  }
899  }
900  else{
901  pm->ps->states &= ~isDashing;
902  pm->ps->states &= ~isHovering;
903  }
904 }

928 void PM_CheckBoost(void){
929  int limit;
930  limit = pm->ps->powerLevel[plLimit];
931  if(!(pm->ps->options & canBoost) || (pm->ps->bitFlags & isStruggling) || (pm->ps->baseStats[stJumpTimedPower] == -1)){return;}
932  if(pm->ps->timers[tmBoost] < 0){
933  pm->ps->timers[tmBoost] += pml.msec;
934  if(pm->ps->timers[tmBoost] > 0){pm->ps->timers[tmBoost] = 0;}
935  }
936  if(pm->ps->measureTimers[mtBoost]){
937  if(!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_BOOST)){
938  PM_StopBoost();
939  }
940  else{
941  pm->ps->eFlags |= EF_AURA;
942  pm->ps->measureTimers[mtBoost] += pml.msec;
943  pm->ps->timers[tmBoost] += pml.msec;
944  if(pm->ps->timers[tmBoost] > limit){pm->ps->timers[tmBoost] = limit;}
945  if(pm->ps->measureTimers[mtBoost] > 150){
946  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += (pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.002) * pm->ps->baseStats[stBoostCost];
947  pm->ps->measureTimers[mtBoost] -= 150;
948  }
949  }
950  }
951  else if(!pm->ps->timers[tmBoost] && (pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_BOOST)){
952  pm->ps->measureTimers[mtBoost] = 1;
953  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.05;
954  if(!(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost)){PM_AddEvent(EV_BOOST_START);}
955  pm->ps->bitFlags |= usingBoost;
956  }
957 }

964 /*===============
965 PM_AddTouchEnt
966 ===============*/
967 void PM_AddTouchEnt(int entityNum){
968  int i;
969  if(entityNum == ENTITYNUM_WORLD){
970  return;
971  }
972  if(pm->numtouch == MAXTOUCH){
973  return;
974  }
975  // see ifit is already added
976  for (i = 0 ; i < pm->numtouch ; i++){
977  if(pm->touchents[ i ] == entityNum){
978  return;
979  }
980  }
981  // add it
982  pm->touchents[pm->numtouch] = entityNum;
983  pm->numtouch++;
984 }

986 /*
987 ==================
988 PM_ClipVelocity
989 
990 Slide off of the impacting surface
991 ==================
992 */
993 void PM_ClipVelocity(vec3_t in, vec3_t normal, vec3_t out, float overbounce){
994  float backoff;
995  float change;
996  int i;
997  backoff = DotProduct (in, normal);
998  if(backoff < 0){
999  backoff *= overbounce;
1000  } else{
1001  backoff /= overbounce;
1002  }
1003  for (i=0 ; i<3 ; i++){
1004  change = normal[i]*backoff;
1005  out[i] = in[i] - change;
1006  }
1007 }

1010 /*==================
1011 PM_Friction
1012 ==================*/
1013 void PM_Friction(void){
1014  float speed,newspeed,control,drop;
1015  speed = VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity);
1016  if(speed < 5){
1017  PM_StopDash();
1018  VectorClear(pm->ps->velocity);
1019  return;
1020  }
1021  if(pm->waterlevel){
1022  drop += speed*pm_waterfriction*pm->waterlevel*pml.frametime;
1023  }
1024  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingFlight || pml.onGround){
1025  control = speed < pm_stopspeed ? pm_stopspeed : speed;
1026  drop += control*pm_friction*pml.frametime;
1027  }
1028  /*
1029  if(pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] > 0){
1030  if(!(pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_TIME_KNOCKBACK)){
1031  drop = speed*20*pml.frametime;
1032  } else {
1033  drop = speed*pml.frametime;
1034  }
1035  }*/
1036  newspeed = speed - drop;
1037  if(newspeed < 0) {newspeed = 0;}
1038  newspeed /= speed;
1039  pm->ps->velocity[0] *= newspeed;
1040  pm->ps->velocity[1] *= newspeed;
1041  pm->ps->velocity[2] *= newspeed;
1042 }
1043 /*==============
1044 PM_Accelerate
1045 ==============*/
1046 void PM_Accelerate(vec3_t wishdir, float wishspeed, float accel){
1047  int i;
1048  float addspeed, accelspeed, currentspeed;
1049  if(pm->waterlevel){
1050  float waterScale;
1051  pm->ps->bitFlags |= underWater;
1052  waterScale = 1.0f - (1.0f - pm_swimScale)* (float)pm->waterlevel / 3.0f;
1053  wishspeed = wishspeed * waterScale;
1054  PM_StopJumpChain();
1055  }
1056  else{
1057  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~underWater;
1058  }
1059  currentspeed = DotProduct (pm->ps->velocity, wishdir);
1060  addspeed = wishspeed - currentspeed;
1061  if(addspeed <= 0) {
1062  return;
1063  }
1064  accelspeed = accel*pml.frametime*wishspeed;
1065  if(accelspeed > addspeed) {
1066  accelspeed = addspeed;
1067  }
1068 
1069  for (i=0 ; i<3 ; i++) {
1070  pm->ps->velocity[i] += accelspeed*wishdir[i];
1071  }
1072 }
1073 
1074 /*
1075 ============
1076 PM_CmdScale
1077 
1078 Returns the scale factor to apply to cmd movements
1079 This allows the clients to use axial -127 to 127 values for all directions
1080 without getting a sqrt(2) distortion in speed.
1081 ============
1082 */
1083 float PM_CmdScale(usercmd_t *cmd){
1084  int max;
1085  int totalSpeed;
1086  float total;
1087  float scale;
1088  max = abs(cmd->forwardmove);
1089  if(abs(cmd->rightmove)> max){max = abs(cmd->rightmove);}
1090  if(abs(cmd->upmove)> max){max = abs(cmd->upmove);}
1091  if(!max){return 0;}
1092  total = sqrt(cmd->forwardmove * cmd->forwardmove + cmd->rightmove * cmd->rightmove + cmd->upmove * cmd->upmove);
1093  totalSpeed = (pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] / 72.81) + (pm->ps->baseStats[stSpeed] * 450);
1094  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar){totalSpeed *= pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost ? 2.5 : 3.5;}
1095  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost){totalSpeed *= pm->ps->timers[tmBoost] <= 1000 ? 4.2 : 2.8;}
1096  if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_WALKING){totalSpeed = 1000;}
1097  if(pm->ps->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] > 0){
1098  totalSpeed = 500;
1099  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmMeleeIdle] > 1500 && pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] > 1500){totalSpeed = 1500;}
1100  }
1101  if(pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] < 0){totalSpeed = 4000;}
1102  scale = (float)totalSpeed * max / (127.0 * total);
1103  return scale;
1104 }
1105 /*=============
1106 PM_CheckJump
1107 =============*/
1108 void PM_NotOnGround(void){
1109  pml.groundPlane = qfalse;
1110  pml.onGround = qfalse;
1111  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~atopGround;
1112  pm->ps->timers[tmOnGround] = 0;
1113  pm->ps->groundEntityNum = ENTITYNUM_NONE;
1114 }
1115 void PM_StopJumpChain(void){
1116  pm->ps->baseStats[stJumpTimedPower] = 0;
1117  pm->ps->stats[stJumpTimed] = 0;
1118  PM_StopBlink();
1119 }
1120 void PM_StopBlink(void){
1121  pm->ps->timers[tmBlink] = 0;
1122  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isBlinking;
1123 }
1124 void PM_StopJump(void){
1125  if(!pm->ps->timers[tmJump]){
1126  PM_StopJumpChain();
1127  }
1128  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingJump){
1129  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingJump;
1130  VectorScale(pm->ps->velocity,0.01,pm->ps->velocity);
1131  }
1132  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBallFlip){
1133  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingBallFlip;
1134  PM_AddEvent(EV_STOPLOOPINGSOUND);
1135  }
1136 }
1137 void PM_CheckBlink(void){
1138  qtime_t realRandom;
1139  trap_RealTime(&realRandom);
1140  if(pm->ps->timers[tmBlink] < 0){
1141  pm->ps->timers[tmBlink] += pml.msec;
1142  pm->ps->bitFlags |= isBlinking;
1143  if(pm->ps->timers[tmBlink] >= 0){
1144  pm->ps->timers[tmBlink] = (Q_random(&realRandom.tm_sec) * 100) + 33;
1145  }
1146  }
1147  else if(pm->ps->timers[tmBlink] > 0){
1148  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isBlinking;
1149  pm->ps->timers[tmBlink] -= pml.msec;
1150  if(pm->ps->timers[tmBlink] <= 0){
1151  pm->ps->timers[tmBlink] = -(Q_random(&realRandom.tm_sec) * 1000) - 100;
1152  }
1153  }
1154 }
1155 void PM_CheckJump(void){
1156  int jumpPower;
1157  float jumpScale,jumpEmphasis;
1158  vec3_t pre_vel,post_vel;
1159  if(!(pm->ps->options & canJump)){return;}
1160  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBallFlip || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingFlight){
1161  PM_StopJump();
1162  return;
1163  }
1164  if(pm->ps->timers[tmOnGround] > 1000){PM_StopJumpChain();}
1165  if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_JUMP && (pm->ps->bitFlags & nearGround)){
1166  pm->ps->timers[tmJump] += pml.msec;
1167  if(pm->ps->timers[tmJump] > 4000){pm->ps->timers[tmJump] = 4000;}
1168  }
1169  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingJump){
1170  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & nearGround && pm->ps->velocity[2] < 0){
1171  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_FLY_DOWN);
1172  }
1173  else if(pm->ps->velocity[2] < 200){
1174  if(pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_BACKWARDS_JUMP){PM_ForceLegsAnim(ANIM_LAND_BACK);}
1175  else if(pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_FORWARDS_JUMP){PM_ForceLegsAnim(ANIM_LAND_UP);}
1176  else{PM_ForceLegsAnim(ANIM_LAND_UP);}
1177  }
1178  if((pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_CHARGING || pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_ALTCHARGING)){
1179  PM_StartFlight();
1180  }
1181  return;
1182  }
1183  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingAlter || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingFlight || pm->cmd.upmove < 0 || pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_GUIDING
1184  || pm->ps->bitFlags & isStruggling || (!(pm->ps->bitFlags & atopGround && !(pm->waterlevel)))){return;}
1185  if(!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_JUMP) && pm->ps->timers[tmJump]){
1186  float extra;
1187  float truePower;
1188  qtime_t realRandom;
1189  trap_RealTime(&realRandom);
1190  pm->ps->bitFlags |= usingJump;
1191  jumpPower = (pm->ps->baseStats[stSpeed] * 450);
1192  jumpEmphasis = 2500.0;
1193  pm->ps->gravity[2] = 12000;
1194  if(pm->ps->timers[tmOnGround] < 500){
1195  pm->ps->stats[stJumpTimed] += 1;
1196  }
1197  else{
1198  PM_StopJumpChain();
1199  }
1200  PM_NotOnGround();
1201  PM_StopDash();
1202  if(pm->ps->timers[tmJump] < 750 && pm->ps->baseStats[stJumpTimedPower] <= 0){
1203  PM_StopBoost();
1204  extra = pm->ps->stats[stJumpTimed];
1205  if(extra > 3){extra = 3;}
1206  jumpEmphasis += (700) * extra;
1207  if((pm->ps->stats[stJumpTimed] == 5) && !pm->ps->timers[tmBlink]){
1208  pm->ps->timers[tmBlink] = -(Q_random(&realRandom.tm_sec) * 1000) - 100;
1209  }
1210  truePower = jumpPower * (4 + extra);
1211  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.005;
1212  PM_AddEvent(EV_HIGHJUMP);
1213  pm->ps->baseStats[stJumpTimedPower] = -1;
1214  }
1215  else{
1216  extra = pm->ps->timers[tmJump] / 1000;
1217  if(pm->cmd.forwardmove || pm->cmd.rightmove){extra *= 0.75;}
1218  if(extra < 1.0){extra = 1.0;}
1219  truePower = pm->ps->stats[stJumpTimed] ? pm->ps->baseStats[stJumpTimedPower] : jumpPower * (6 * extra);
1220  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost){jumpEmphasis = 5000;}
1221  pm->ps->gravity[2] = 6000;
1222  pm->ps->baseStats[stJumpTimedPower] = truePower;
1223  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.03;
1224  PM_AddEvent(EV_JUMP);
1225  }
1226  if(pm->cmd.forwardmove > 0){
1227  PM_ForceLegsAnim(ANIM_JUMP_UP);
1228  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_FORWARDS_JUMP;
1229  pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_BACKWARDS_JUMP;
1230  }
1231  else if(pm->cmd.forwardmove < 0 || pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_BACKWARDS_JUMP){
1232  PM_ForceLegsAnim(ANIM_JUMP_BACK);
1233  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_BACKWARDS_JUMP;
1234  pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_FORWARDS_JUMP;
1235  }
1236  else{
1237  PM_ForceLegsAnim(ANIM_JUMP_UP);
1238  pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_BACKWARDS_JUMP;
1239  pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_FORWARDS_JUMP;
1240  }
1241  pm->ps->velocity[2] = 0;
1242  VectorNormalize(pm->ps->velocity);
1243  VectorCopy(pm->ps->velocity,pre_vel);
1244  VectorScale(pm->ps->velocity,jumpEmphasis,pm->ps->velocity);
1245  VectorNormalize2(pm->ps->velocity,post_vel);
1246  pm->ps->velocity[2] = truePower;
1247  pm->ps->timers[tmJump] = 0;
1248  }
1249 }
1250 
1251 /*==================
1252 PM_CheckStruggling
1253 ==================*/
1254 void PM_CheckStruggling(void){
1255  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & isStruggling){
1256  PM_StopMovement();
1257  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 100;
1258  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost){
1259  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.002;
1260  }else{
1261  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.001;
1262  }
1263  }
1264 }

1266 /*=============
1267 PM_CheckBlock
1268 =============*/
1269 void PM_CheckBlock(void){
1270  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingBlock;
1271  if(!(pm->ps->options & canBlock)){return;}
1272  if((pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_BLOCK)
1273  && !(pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_CHARGING || pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_ALTCHARGING)
1274  && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingAlter)
1275  && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar)
1276  && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingZanzoken)
1277  && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingWeapon)
1278  && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & isStruggling)
1279  && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & isGuiding)
1280  && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & isPreparing)){
1281  pm->ps->bitFlags |= usingBlock;
1282  }
1283 }

1287 void PM_StopSoar(void){
1288  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isPreparing;
1289  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingSoar;
1290  pm->ps->states &= ~lockedRoll;
1291  pm->ps->states &= ~lockedPitch;
1292  pm->ps->states &= ~lockedYaw;
1293  pm->ps->states &= ~locked360;
1294 }
1295 void PM_StopFlight(void){
1296  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingFlight;
1297 }
1298 void PM_StartFlight(void){
1299  PM_StopJump();
1300  PM_StopBlink();
1301  pm->ps->bitFlags |= usingFlight;
1302 }
1303 void PM_SuddenBrake(void){
1304  pm->ps->timers[tmKnockback] = -500;
1305  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 500;
1306  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += 0.01 * pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue];
1307  PM_AddEvent(EV_AIRBRAKE);
1308 }
1309 void PM_FlyMove(void){
1310  int i;
1311  vec3_t wishvel;
1312  vec3_t wishdir;
1313  float soarCost;
1314  float wishspeed;
1315  float fadeSpeed;
1316  float scale;
1317  if(!(pm->ps->options & canFly)){
1318  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingFlight;
1319  return;
1320  }
1321  if(pm->cmd.upmove > 0){
1322  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingJump && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & underWater)){PM_SuddenBrake();}
1323  PM_StartFlight();
1324  PM_StopDash();
1325  PM_StopJump();
1326  PM_StopJumpChain();
1327  }
1328  if((pm->ps->bitFlags & usingAlter || pm->ps->timers[tmTransform]) && !VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity)){return;}
1329  if(!(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingFlight)){return;}
1330  if((pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_JUMP &&
1331  !(pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_CHARGING || pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_ALTCHARGING) &&
1332  !(pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_GUIDING || pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_ALTGUIDING) &&
1333  !(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingZanzoken)) ||
1334  (pm->ps->states & lockedPitch || pm->ps->states & lockedYaw || pm->ps->states & lockedRoll)){
1335  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingJump || !(pm->ps->options & canSoar)){return;}
1336  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar && pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] <= pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.15){
1337  PM_StopSoar();
1338  return;
1339  }
1340  else if(!(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar) && pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] <= pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.2){return;}
1341  //if(PM_CheckDirection(pml.forward,qfalse)){PM_Crash(qtrue);}
1342  pm->ps->timers[tmSoar] += pml.msec;
1343  pm->ps->eFlags |= EF_AURA;
1344  if(!(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar)){
1345  pm->cmd.upmove = pm->cmd.rightmove = pm->cmd.forwardmove = 0;
1346  pm->ps->bitFlags |= isPreparing;
1347  if(pm->ps->timers[tmSoar] < 700){return;}
1348  pm->ps->bitFlags |= usingSoar;
1349  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isPreparing;
1350  pm->ps->timers[tmSoar] = 0;
1351  PM_WeaponRelease();
1352  }
1353  soarCost = 0;
1354  if(pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.7 > pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue]){
1355  soarCost = pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.001;
1356  }
1357  if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_BOOST){
1358  if(soarCost){soarCost = pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.002;}
1359  }
1360  fadeSpeed = 2.0;
1361  while(pm->ps->timers[tmSoar] > 10){
1362  pm->ps->timers[tmSoar] -= 10;
1363  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += soarCost;
1364  }
1365  pm->cmd.upmove = pm->cmd.rightmove = 0;
1366  pm->cmd.forwardmove = 127;
1367  }
1368  else if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar || pm->ps->bitFlags & isPreparing){
1369  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 1000;
1370  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingSoar;
1371  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isPreparing;
1372  pm->ps->eFlags &= ~EF_AURA;
1373  }
1374  scale = PM_CmdScale(&pm->cmd);
1375  if(!scale){
1376  wishvel[0] = 0;
1377  wishvel[1] = 0;
1378  wishvel[2] = 0;
1379  }
1380  else{
1381  for(i=0 ;i<3;i++){
1382  wishvel[i] = scale * pml.forward[i] * pm->cmd.forwardmove + scale * pml.right[i] * pm->cmd.rightmove + scale * pml.up[i] * pm->cmd.upmove;
1383  }
1384  }
1385  VectorCopy(wishvel, wishdir);
1386  wishspeed = VectorNormalize(wishdir);
1387  PM_Accelerate(wishdir,wishspeed,pm_flyaccelerate);
1388 }
1389 
1390 
1391 /*===================
1392 PM_AirMove
1393 ===================*/
1394 void PM_AirMove(void){
1395  int i,backupDrift;
1396  vec3_t wishvel;
1397  float fmove, smove;
1398  vec3_t wishdir;
1399  qboolean gravity;
1400  float wishspeed;
1401  float scale;
1402  usercmd_t cmd;
1403  backupDrift = pm->cmd.forwardmove;
1404  if((!pm->ps->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] && pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] >= 0) && (pml.onGround
1405  || ((pm->ps->bitFlags & usingAlter || pm->ps->timers[tmTransform]) && !VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity))
1406  && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & isUnconcious) && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & isDead) && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & isCrashed))){return;}
1407  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & isGuiding){return;}
1408  if(!(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingFlight) && pm->ps->options & canBallFlip){
1409  if(pm->cmd.upmove < 0 && pm->ps->velocity[2] < 0 && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & nearGround) && !(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_POWERLEVEL)){
1410  pm->ps->velocity[1] = 0;
1411  pm->ps->velocity[0] = 0;
1412  pm->ps->gravity[2] = 1000;
1413  pm->ps->bitFlags |= usingBallFlip;
1414  PM_AddEvent(EV_BALLFLIP);
1415  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_JUMP_FORWARD);
1416  PM_ForceTorsoAnim(ANIM_JUMP_FORWARD);
1417  }
1418  else if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBallFlip){
1419  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingBallFlip;
1420  PM_AddEvent(EV_STOPLOOPINGSOUND);
1421  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & nearGround && pm->ps->velocity[2] < 0){PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_FLY_DOWN);}
1422  }
1423  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBallFlip){PM_StopDirections();}
1424  }
1425  if(pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] < 0){
1426  PM_StopDirections();
1427  pm->cmd.forwardmove = -127;
1428  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] += pml.msec;
1429  if(pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] > 0){pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] = 0;}
1430  }
1431  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingMelee){
1432  PM_StopDirections();
1433  if(pm->ps->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] == 1){pm->cmd.forwardmove = 127;}
1434  else if(pm->ps->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] == 2){pm->cmd.forwardmove = -127;}
1435  }
1436  fmove = pm->cmd.forwardmove;
1437  smove = pm->cmd.rightmove;
1438  cmd = pm->cmd;
1439  scale = PM_CmdScale(&cmd);
1440  pml.forward[2] = 0;
1441  pml.right[2] = 0;
1442  VectorNormalize(pml.forward);
1443  VectorNormalize(pml.right);
1444  for(i = 0 ; i < 2 ; i++){
1445  wishvel[i] = pml.forward[i]*fmove + pml.right[i]*smove;
1446  }
1447  wishvel[2] = 0;
1448  VectorCopy (wishvel, wishdir);
1449  wishspeed = VectorNormalize(wishdir);
1450  wishspeed *= scale;
1451  PM_Accelerate (wishdir, wishspeed, pm_airaccelerate);
1452  if(pml.groundPlane){
1453  PM_ClipVelocity(pm->ps->velocity, pml.groundTrace.plane.normal,pm->ps->velocity, OVERCLIP);
1454  }
1455  if(pm->waterlevel == 3){
1456  pm->ps->velocity[2] += 0.7f * pm->ps->gravity[2] * pml.frametime;
1457  }
1458  gravity = pm->ps->bitFlags & usingFlight ? qfalse : qtrue;
1459  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingZanzoken){
1460  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingJump){gravity = qtrue;}
1461  pm->tracemask = CONTENTS_SOLID;
1462  }
1463  PM_StepSlideMove(gravity);
1464  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingZanzoken){pm->tracemask = MASK_PLAYERSOLID;}
1465  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingMelee){
1466  PM_StopDirections();
1467  }
1468  pm->cmd.forwardmove = backupDrift;
1469 }
1470 /*===================
1471 PM_WalkMove
1472 ===================*/
1473 void PM_WalkMove(void){
1474  int i;
1475  vec3_t wishvel;
1476  float fmove, smove;
1477  vec3_t wishdir;
1478  float wishspeed;
1479  float scale;
1480  usercmd_t cmd;
1481  float accelerate;
1482  float vel;
1483  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingFlight){return;}
1484  if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_POWERLEVEL && !VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity)){return;}
1485  if(!pml.onGround || VectorLength(pm->ps->dashDir)){return;}
1486  fmove = pm->cmd.forwardmove;
1487  //With smove = 0, the char cannot walk sideways
1488  //smove = pm->cmd.rightmove;
1489  smove = 0;
1490  cmd = pm->cmd;
1491  scale = PM_CmdScale(&cmd);
1492  // set the movementDir so clients can rotate the legs for strafing
1493  pml.forward[2] = 0;
1494  pml.right[2] = 0;
1495  PM_ClipVelocity (pml.forward, pml.groundTrace.plane.normal, pml.forward, OVERCLIP );
1496  PM_ClipVelocity (pml.right, pml.groundTrace.plane.normal, pml.right, OVERCLIP );
1497  VectorNormalize (pml.forward);
1498  VectorNormalize (pml.right);
1499  for (i = 0 ; i < 3 ; i++){
1500  wishvel[i] = pml.forward[i]*fmove + pml.right[i]*smove;
1501  }
1502  VectorCopy (wishvel, wishdir);
1503  wishspeed = VectorNormalize(wishdir);
1504  wishspeed *= scale * 0.60f;
1505  accelerate = pm_accelerate;
1506  PM_Accelerate (wishdir, wishspeed,accelerate);
1507  vel = VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity);
1508  PM_ClipVelocity(pm->ps->velocity, pml.groundTrace.plane.normal,pm->ps->velocity, OVERCLIP );
1509  VectorNormalize(pm->ps->velocity);
1510  VectorScale(pm->ps->velocity, vel, pm->ps->velocity);
1511  if(!pm->ps->velocity[0] && !pm->ps->velocity[1]) {
1512  return;
1513  }
1514  if(pm->waterlevel == 3){
1515  pm->ps->velocity[2] += 0.7f * pm->ps->gravity[2] * pml.frametime;
1516  }
1517  PM_StepSlideMove(qfalse);
1518 }
1519 /*=============
1520 PM_DashMove
1521 =============*/
1522 void PM_DashMove(void){
1523  int i;
1524  vec3_t wishvel;
1525  vec3_t wishdir;
1526  float fmove,smove;
1527  float wishspeed;
1528  float scale;
1529  float dashAmount;
1530  float accelerate;
1531  usercmd_t cmd;
1532  dashAmount = VectorLength(pm->ps->dashDir);
1533  if((pm->ps->bitFlags & usingAlter || pm->ps->timers[tmTransform]) && !VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity)){return;}
1534  if((pml.onGround && !(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_WALKING) && (pm->cmd.forwardmove || pm->cmd.rightmove))){
1535  pm->cmd.upmove = 0;
1536  if(dashAmount == 0){
1537  pm->ps->dashDir[0] = 0;
1538  pm->ps->dashDir[1] = 0;
1539  if(pm->cmd.forwardmove > 0){
1540  pm->ps->dashDir[0] = 1;
1541  pm->cmd.forwardmove = 127;
1542  }else if(pm->cmd.forwardmove < 0){
1543  pm->ps->dashDir[0] = -1;
1544  pm->cmd.forwardmove = -127;
1545  }
1546  if(pm->cmd.rightmove > 0){
1547  pm->ps->dashDir[1] = 1;
1548  pm->cmd.rightmove = 127;
1549  }else if(pm->cmd.rightmove < 0){
1550  pm->ps->dashDir[1] = -1;
1551  pm->cmd.rightmove = -127;
1552  }
1553  }
1554  cmd = pm->cmd;
1555  fmove = pm->cmd.forwardmove;
1556  smove = pm->cmd.rightmove;
1557  scale = PM_CmdScale(&cmd);
1558  pml.forward[2] = 0;
1559  pml.right[2] = 0;
1560  VectorNormalize(pml.forward);
1561  VectorNormalize(pml.right);
1562  for(i=0;i<2;i++){
1563  wishvel[i] = pml.forward[i]*fmove + pml.right[i]*smove;
1564  }
1565  wishvel[2] = 0;
1566  VectorCopy (wishvel, wishdir);
1567  wishspeed = VectorNormalize(wishdir);
1568  wishspeed *= scale;
1569  accelerate = pm_dashaccelerate;
1570  PM_Accelerate(wishdir,wishspeed,accelerate);
1571  if(pml.groundPlane){
1572  PM_ClipVelocity(pm->ps->velocity,pml.groundTrace.plane.normal,pm->ps->velocity,OVERCLIP);
1573  }
1574  if(pm->waterlevel == 3){
1575  pm->ps->velocity[2] += 0.7f * pm->ps->gravity[2] * pml.frametime;
1576  }
1577  PM_StepSlideMove(qtrue);
1578  }
1579  else{
1580  PM_StopDash();
1581  }
1582 }
1583 /*===============
1584 PM_NoclipMove
1585 ===============*/
1586 void PM_NoclipMove(void){
1587  float speed, drop, friction, control, newspeed;
1588  int i;
1589  vec3_t wishvel;
1590  float fmove, smove;
1591  vec3_t wishdir;
1592  float wishspeed;
1593  float scale;
1594 
1595  pm->ps->viewheight = DEFAULT_VIEWHEIGHT;
1596 
1597  // friction
1598 
1599  speed = VectorLength (pm->ps->velocity);
1600  if(speed < 1){
1601  VectorCopy (vec3_origin, pm->ps->velocity);
1602  }
1603  else
1604  {
1605  drop = 0;
1606 
1607  friction = pm_friction*1.5; // extra friction
1608  control = speed < pm_stopspeed ? pm_stopspeed : speed;
1609  drop += control*friction*pml.frametime;
1610 
1611  // scale the velocity
1612  newspeed = speed - drop;
1613  if(newspeed < 0)
1614  newspeed = 0;
1615  newspeed /= speed;
1616 
1617  VectorScale (pm->ps->velocity, newspeed, pm->ps->velocity);
1618  }
1619 
1620  // accelerate
1621  scale = PM_CmdScale(&pm->cmd );
1622 
1623  fmove = pm->cmd.forwardmove;
1624  smove = pm->cmd.rightmove;
1625 
1626  for (i=0 ; i<3 ; i++)
1627  wishvel[i] = pml.forward[i]*fmove + pml.right[i]*smove;
1628  wishvel[2] += pm->cmd.upmove;
1629 
1630  VectorCopy (wishvel, wishdir);
1631  wishspeed = VectorNormalize(wishdir);
1632  wishspeed *= scale;
1633 
1634  PM_Accelerate(wishdir, wishspeed, pm_accelerate );
1635 
1636  // move
1637  VectorMA (pm->ps->origin, pml.frametime, pm->ps->velocity, pm->ps->origin);
1638 }
1639 /*================
1640 PM_FootstepForSurface
1641 ================*/
1642 int PM_FootstepForSurface(void){
1643  if(pml.groundTrace.surfaceFlags & SURF_NOSTEPS){
1644  return 0;
1645  }
1646  if(pml.groundTrace.surfaceFlags & SURF_METALSTEPS){
1647  return EV_FOOTSTEP_METAL;
1648  }
1649  return EV_FOOTSTEP;
1650 }
1651 /*=================
1652 PM_Land
1653 =================*/
1654 void PM_Land(void){
1655  float delta;
1656  float dist;
1657  float vel, acc;
1658  float t;
1659  float a, b, c, den;
1660  pm->ps->legsTimer = TIMER_LAND;
1661  // calculate the exact velocity on landing
1662  dist = pm->ps->origin[2] - pml.previous_origin[2];
1663  vel = pml.previous_velocity[2];
1664  acc = -pm->ps->gravity[2];
1665 
1666  a = acc / 2;
1667  b = vel;
1668  c = -dist;
1669 
1670  den = b * b - 4 * a * c;
1671  if(den < 0){
1672  return;
1673  }
1674  t = (-b - sqrt(den)) / (2 * a );
1675 
1676  delta = vel + t * acc;
1677  delta = delta*delta * 0.0001;
1678  // reduce falling damage ifthere is standing water
1679  if(pm->waterlevel == 2){
1680  delta *= 0.25;
1681  }
1682  if(pm->waterlevel == 1){
1683  delta *= 0.5;
1684  }
1685 
1686  if(delta < 1){
1687  return;
1688  }
1689  // start footstep cycle over
1690  pm->ps->bobCycle = 0;
1691 }
1692 /*
1693 =============
1694 PM_CorrectAllSolid
1695 =============
1696 */
1697 int PM_CorrectAllSolid(trace_t *trace){
1698  int i, j, k;
1699  vec3_t point;
1700  // jitter around
1701  for (i = -1; i <= 1; i++) {
1702  for (j = -1; j <= 1; j++) {
1703  for (k = -1; k <= 1; k++) {
1704  VectorCopy(pm->ps->origin, point);
1705  point[0] += (float) i;
1706  point[1] += (float) j;
1707  point[2] += (float) k;
1708  pm->trace (trace, point, pm->mins, pm->maxs, point, pm->ps->clientNum, pm->tracemask);
1709  if(!trace->allsolid){
1710  point[0] = pm->ps->origin[0];
1711  point[1] = pm->ps->origin[1];
1712  point[2] = pm->ps->origin[2] - 0.25;
1713 
1714  pm->trace (trace, pm->ps->origin, pm->mins, pm->maxs, point, pm->ps->clientNum, pm->tracemask);
1715  pml.groundTrace = *trace;
1716  return qtrue;
1717  }
1718  }
1719  }
1720  }
1721  PM_NotOnGround();
1722  return qfalse;
1723 }
1724 /*
1725 =============
1726 PM_GroundTraceMissed
1727 
1728 The ground trace didn't hit a surface, so we are in freefall
1729 =============
1730 */
1731 int PM_CheckDirection(vec3_t direction,qboolean player){
1732  vec3_t point;
1733  trace_t trace;
1734  int flags = pm->tracemask &~ CONTENTS_BODY;
1735  VectorMA(pm->ps->origin,64,direction,point);
1736  if(player){flags = CONTENTS_BODY;}
1737  pm->trace(&trace,pm->ps->origin,pm->mins,pm->maxs,point,pm->ps->clientNum,flags);
1738  if(trace.allsolid && (!PM_CorrectAllSolid(&trace))){return 0;}
1739  if(trace.fraction == 1.0){
1740  return 0;
1741  }
1742  if(player){return trace.entityNum+1;}
1743  return 1;
1744 }
1745 void PM_GroundTraceMissed(void){
1746  trace_t trace;
1747  vec3_t point;
1748  if(pm->ps->groundEntityNum != ENTITYNUM_NONE){
1749  VectorCopy(pm->ps->origin, point );
1750  point[2] -= 64;
1751  pm->trace (&trace, pm->ps->origin, pm->mins, pm->maxs, point, pm->ps->clientNum, pm->tracemask);
1752  if(trace.fraction == 1.0){
1753  PM_StopDash();
1754  }
1755  }
1756  PM_NotOnGround();
1757 }
1758 void PM_NotNearGround(void){
1759  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~nearGround;
1760 }
1761 void PM_NearGroundTrace(void){
1762  vec3_t point;
1763  trace_t trace;
1764  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & atopGround){
1765  if(pm->ps->timers[tmFall] >= 4000){PM_AddEvent(EV_FALL_FAR);}
1766  else if(pm->ps->timers[tmFall] >= 2000){PM_AddEvent(EV_FALL_MEDIUM);}
1767  else if(pm->ps->timers[tmFall] >= 500){PM_AddEvent(EV_FALL_SHORT);}
1768  pm->ps->timers[tmFall] = 0;
1769  return;
1770  }
1771  pm->ps->timers[tmFall] += pml.msec;
1772  point[0] = pm->ps->origin[0] - (pml.gravityNormal[0] * 450.0f);
1773  point[1] = pm->ps->origin[1] - (pml.gravityNormal[1] * 450.0f);
1774  point[2] = pm->ps->origin[2] - (pml.gravityNormal[2] * 450.0f);
1775  pm->trace(&trace,pm->ps->origin,pm->mins,pm->maxs,point,pm->ps->clientNum,pm->tracemask);
1776  if(trace.allsolid && (!PM_CorrectAllSolid(&trace))){return;}
1777  if(trace.fraction == 1.0){
1778  PM_NotNearGround();
1779  return;
1780  }
1781  pm->ps->bitFlags |= nearGround;
1782 }
1783 /*=============
1784 PM_GroundTrace
1785 =============*/
1786 void PM_GroundTrace(void){
1787  vec3_t point;
1788  vec3_t distanceVector;
1789  trace_t trace;
1790  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar){return;}
1791  VectorSubtract(pm->ps->origin,pml.gravityNormal,point);
1792  //Com_Printf("Point : %f, %f, %f\n",point[0],point[1],point[2]);
1793  pm->trace (&trace, pm->ps->origin, pm->mins, pm->maxs, point, pm->ps->clientNum, pm->tracemask);
1794  pml.groundTrace = trace;
1795  if(trace.allsolid && (!PM_CorrectAllSolid(&trace))){return;}
1796  // if the trace didn't hit anything, we are in free fall
1797  if(trace.fraction == 1.0){
1798  PM_GroundTraceMissed();
1799  pml.groundPlane = qfalse;
1800  pml.onGround = qfalse;
1801  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~atopGround;
1802  return;
1803  }
1804  if(pm->ps->velocity[2] > 0 && DotProduct(pm->ps->velocity, trace.plane.normal)> 10){
1805  PM_NotOnGround();
1806  return;
1807  }
1808  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingFlight){
1809  vec3_t testVec;
1810  VectorNormalize2(pml.up, testVec);
1811  if((testVec[2] < 0.9f) || (pm->cmd.upmove >= 0)){
1812  PM_NotOnGround();
1813  return;
1814  }
1815  else{
1816  PM_StopFlight();
1817  PM_StopZanzoken();
1818  }
1819  }
1820  // slopes that are too steep will not be considered onground
1821  if(trace.plane.normal[2] < MIN_WALK_NORMAL){
1822  PM_NotOnGround();
1823  pml.groundPlane = qtrue;
1824  return;
1825  }
1826  pml.groundPlane = qtrue;
1827  pml.onGround = qtrue;
1828  pm->ps->bitFlags |= atopGround;
1829  pm->ps->timers[tmOnGround] += pml.msec;
1830  if(pm->ps->timers[tmOnGround] > 32000){pm->ps->timers[tmOnGround] = 32000;}
1831  if(pm->ps->groundEntityNum == ENTITYNUM_NONE && (pm->ps->bitFlags & usingJump || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingFlight
1832  || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBallFlip || pm->ps->bitFlags & isUnconcious || pm->ps->bitFlags & isDead)){
1833  PM_StopFlight();
1834  PM_Land();
1835  PM_StopJump();
1836  }
1837  pm->ps->groundEntityNum = trace.entityNum;
1838  // don't reset the z velocity for slopes
1839  //pm->ps->velocity[2] = 0;
1840  PM_AddTouchEnt(trace.entityNum );
1841 }

1845 PM_SetWaterLevel
1846 =============*/
1847 void PM_SetWaterLevel(void){
1848  vec3_t point;
1849  int cont;
1850  int sample1;
1851  int sample2;
1852  pm->waterlevel = 0;
1853  pm->watertype = 0;
1854  if(pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_TIME_WATERJUMP){
1855  return;
1856  }
1857

1859  point[1] = pm->ps->origin[1];
1860  point[2] = pm->ps->origin[2] + MINS_Z + 1;
1861  cont = pm->pointcontents(point, pm->ps->clientNum );
1862 
1863  if(cont & MASK_WATER){
1864  sample2 = pm->ps->viewheight - MINS_Z;
1865  sample1 = sample2 / 2;
1866 
1867  pm->watertype = cont;
1868  pm->waterlevel = 1;
1869  point[2] = pm->ps->origin[2] + MINS_Z + sample1;
1870  cont = pm->pointcontents (point, pm->ps->clientNum );
1871  if(cont & MASK_WATER){
1872  pm->waterlevel = 2;
1873  point[2] = pm->ps->origin[2] + MINS_Z + sample2;
1874  cont = pm->pointcontents (point, pm->ps->clientNum );
1875  if(cont & MASK_WATER ){
1876  pm->waterlevel = 3;
1877  }
1878  }
1879  }
1880

1894 /*===============
1895 PM_Footsteps
1896 ===============*/
1897 void PM_Footsteps(void){
1898  float bobmove;
1899  int old;
1900  qboolean footstep;
1901  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingZanzoken || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingJump || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBallFlip){return;}
1902  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & keyTierUp || pm->ps->bitFlags & keyTierDown){return;}
1903  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingAlter){
1904  if(pm->cmd.rightmove < 0){
1905  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_IDLE);
1906  return;
1907  }
1908  if(pm->ps->powerLevel[plCurrent] > 31000){PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_KI_CHARGE);}
1909  else{pm->ps->powerLevel[plCurrent] > pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] ? PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_KI_CHARGE) : PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_PL_UP);}
1910  return;
1911  }
1912  pm->xyspeed = sqrt(pm->ps->velocity[0] * pm->ps->velocity[0] + pm->ps->velocity[1] * pm->ps->velocity[1]);
1913  if(pm->waterlevel > 2){
1914  if(pm->cmd.forwardmove > 0 && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingFlight) ){
1915  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_SWIM);
1916  return;
1917  }
1918  else if(!pm->cmd.forwardmove && !pm->cmd.rightmove && !pm->cmd.upmove && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar)){
1919  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_SWIM_IDLE);
1920  return;
1921  }
1922  }
1923  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingFlight){
1924  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar || pm->ps->bitFlags & isPreparing){
1925  pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar ? PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_FLY_FORWARD) : PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_FLY_START);
1926  return;
1927  }
1928  if((!pm->cmd.forwardmove && !pm->cmd.rightmove) || (pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_WALKING )) {
1929  int tempAnimIndex;
1930  pm->ps->bobCycle = 0;
1931  tempAnimIndex = pm->ps->torsoAnim & ~ANIM_TOGGLEBIT;
1932  if((tempAnimIndex >= ANIM_KI_ATTACK1_PREPARE) && (tempAnimIndex <= ANIM_KI_ATTACK6_ALT_FIRE)) {
1933  tempAnimIndex = tempAnimIndex - ANIM_KI_ATTACK1_PREPARE;
1934  tempAnimIndex = ANIM_KI_ATTACK1_PREPARE + tempAnimIndex;
1935  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(tempAnimIndex);
1936  } else{
1937  if(pm->cmd.upmove > 0){PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_FLY_UP);}
1938  else if(pm->cmd.upmove < 0){PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_FLY_DOWN);}
1939  else if(pm->ps->lockedTarget>0){PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_IDLE_LOCKED);}
1940  else{PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_FLY_IDLE);}
1941  }
1942  return;
1943  }
1944  if(pm->cmd.forwardmove > 0){
1945  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DASH_FORWARD);
1946  } else if(pm->cmd.forwardmove < 0){
1947  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DASH_BACKWARD);
1948  } else if(pm->cmd.rightmove > 0){
1949  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DASH_RIGHT);
1950  } else if(pm->cmd.rightmove < 0){
1951  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DASH_LEFT);
1952  }
1953  return;
1954  }
1955  if(!(pm->ps->bitFlags & atopGround)){
1956  if(pm->ps->timers[tmFall] > 750){
1957  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_FLY_DOWN);
1958  }
1959  return;
1960  }
1961  if(!pm->cmd.forwardmove && !pm->cmd.rightmove){
1962  if(pm->xyspeed < 5){
1963  int tempAnimIndex;
1964  pm->ps->bobCycle = 0;
1965  tempAnimIndex = pm->ps->torsoAnim & ~ANIM_TOGGLEBIT;
1966  if((tempAnimIndex >= ANIM_KI_ATTACK1_PREPARE) && (tempAnimIndex <= ANIM_KI_ATTACK6_ALT_FIRE)) {
1967  tempAnimIndex = tempAnimIndex - ANIM_KI_ATTACK1_PREPARE;
1968  tempAnimIndex = ANIM_KI_ATTACK1_PREPARE + tempAnimIndex;
1969  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(tempAnimIndex);
1970  }
1971  else if(pm->ps->bitFlags & atopGround){
1972  if(pm->ps->lockedTarget>0){PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_IDLE_LOCKED);}
1973  else{PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_IDLE);}
1974  }
1975  }
1976  return;
1977  }
1978  footstep = qfalse;
1979  if(!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_WALKING)){
1980  bobmove = 0.4f;
1981  if(!pm->ps->running){
1982  if(pm->cmd.forwardmove < 0) {
1983  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DASH_BACKWARD);
1984  } else if(pm->cmd.forwardmove > 0){
1985  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DASH_FORWARD);
1986  } else if(pm->cmd.rightmove > 0){
1987  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DASH_RIGHT);
1988  } else if(pm->cmd.rightmove < 0){
1989  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DASH_LEFT);
1990  }
1991  }else{
1992  if(pm->cmd.forwardmove < 0){
1993  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_BACKRUN);
1994  } else if(pm->cmd.forwardmove > 0){
1995  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_RUN);
1996  } else if(pm->cmd.rightmove > 0){
1997  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DASH_RIGHT );
1998  } else if(pm->cmd.rightmove < 0){
1999  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_DASH_LEFT);
2000  }
2001  }
2002  footstep = qtrue;
2003  }
2004  else{
2005  bobmove = 0.3f;
2006  //If the player is pressing left or righ and is not moving forward/backwards, the legs must play the idle animation.
2007  if(pm->cmd.rightmove != 0 && pm->cmd.forwardmove == 0)
2008  {
2009  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_IDLE);
2010  }
2011 
2012  else if(pm->cmd.forwardmove < 0){
2013  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_BACKWALK );
2014  }
2015  else{
2016  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_WALK);
2017  }
2018  }
2019  old = pm->ps->bobCycle;
2020  pm->ps->bobCycle = (int)(old + bobmove * pml.msec)& 255;
2021  if(((old + 64)^ (pm->ps->bobCycle + 64)) & 128){
2022  if(pm->waterlevel == 0){
2023  if(footstep && !pm->noFootsteps){
2024  PM_AddEvent(PM_FootstepForSurface());
2025  }
2026  } else if(pm->waterlevel == 1){
2027  PM_AddEvent(EV_FOOTSPLASH );
2028  } else if(pm->waterlevel == 2){
2029  PM_AddEvent(EV_SWIM );
2030  } else if(pm->waterlevel == 3){
2031  }
2032  }
2033 }

2081 /*
2082 ===============
2083 PM_BeginWeaponChange
2084 ===============
2085 */
2086 void PM_BeginWeaponChange(int weapon){
2087  qboolean charging;
2088  qboolean usable;
2089  charging = (pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_CHARGING || pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_ALTCHARGING) ? qtrue : qfalse;
2090  pm->ps->currentSkill[WPSTAT_CHANGED] = -1;
2091  if(pm->ps->weapon == pm->cmd.weapon){
2092  return;
2093  }
2094  if(weapon <= WP_NONE || weapon >= WP_NUM_WEAPONS){
2095  return;
2096  }
2097  if(pm->ps->stats[stMeleeState] > 2 || pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] || charging){
2098  return;
2099  }
2100  if(!(pm->ps->stats[stSkills] & (1 << weapon))){
2101  return;
2102  }
2103  if(pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_DROPPING){
2104  return;
2105  }
2106  PM_AddEvent(EV_CHANGE_WEAPON);
2107  usable = qfalse;
2108  weapon = pm->cmd.weapon;
2109  while(!usable){
2110  if(weapon == 1 && pm->ps->powerups[PW_SKILLS] & USABLE_SKILL1){usable = qtrue;}
2111  if(weapon == 2 && pm->ps->powerups[PW_SKILLS] & USABLE_SKILL2){usable = qtrue;}
2112  if(weapon == 3 && pm->ps->powerups[PW_SKILLS] & USABLE_SKILL3){usable = qtrue;}
2113  if(weapon == 4 && pm->ps->powerups[PW_SKILLS] & USABLE_SKILL4){usable = qtrue;}
2114  if(weapon == 5 && pm->ps->powerups[PW_SKILLS] & USABLE_SKILL5){usable = qtrue;}
2115  if(weapon == 6 && pm->ps->powerups[PW_SKILLS] & USABLE_SKILL6){usable = qtrue;}
2116  if(!usable){
2117  if(pm->cmd.weapon < pm->ps->weapon){weapon -=1;}
2118  else if(pm->cmd.weapon > pm->ps->weapon){weapon +=1;}
2119  else{break;}
2120  if(weapon > 6){weapon = 1;}
2121  if(weapon < 1){weapon = 6;}
2122  }
2123  }
2124  pm->ps->currentSkill[WPSTAT_CHANGED] = 1;
2125  pm->ps->weapon = weapon;
2126  pm->ps->timers[tmAttack1] = 0;
2127  pm->ps->timers[tmAttack2] = 0;
2128 }

2130 /*==============
2131 PM_TorsoAnimation
2132 ==============*/
2133 void PM_TorsoAnimation(void){
2134  if(pm->ps->weaponstate != WEAPON_READY){return;}
2135  if(pm->ps->timers[tmImpede] || pm->ps->states & isBurning){PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_STUNNED);}
2136  if(pm->ps->states & isRiding){PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_KNOCKBACK);}
2137  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBlock && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingMelee)){
2138  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & isStruggling){
2139  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_PUSH);
2140  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_PUSH);
2141  return;
2142  }else{
2143  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_BLOCK);
2144  if(!pm->cmd.forwardmove && !pm->cmd.rightmove){
2145  PM_ContinueLegsAnim(ANIM_BLOCK);
2146  }
2147  return;
2148  }
2149  }
2150  switch(pm->ps->legsAnim & ~ANIM_TOGGLEBIT){
2151  case ANIM_DEATH_AIR_LAND:
2152  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_DEATH_AIR_LAND);
2153  break;
2154  case ANIM_KNOCKBACK:
2155  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_KNOCKBACK);
2156  break;
2157  case ANIM_KNOCKBACK_HIT_WALL:
2158  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_KNOCKBACK_HIT_WALL);
2159  break;
2160  case ANIM_KNOCKBACK_RECOVER_1:
2161  PM_ContinueTorsoAnim(ANIM_KNOCKBACK_RECOVER_1);
