2354 /*=============================================*\
2355  Amazin' Melee (now with 99% more strategy!)
2356 \*=============================================*/
2357 void PM_StopMelee(void){
2358  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingMelee || pm->ps->stats[stMeleeState]){
2359  pm->ps->stats[stMeleeState] = 0;
2360  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeCharge] = 0;
2361  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] = 0;
2362  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeBreaker] = 0;
2363  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~usingMelee;
2364  PM_AddEvent(EV_STOPLOOPINGSOUND);
2365  PM_EndDrift();
2366  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer){
2367  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->stats[stMeleeState] = 0;
2368  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmMeleeCharge] = 0;
2369  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmMeleeIdle] = 0;
2370  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmMeleeBreaker] = 0;
2371  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 0;
2372  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags &= ~usingMelee;
2373  }
2374  }
2375 }
2376 void PM_CheckDrift(void){
2377  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer){
2378  if(!pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] && pm->ps->stats[stMeleeState] & stMeleeUsingSpeed){
2379  pm->ps->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 1;
2380  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 2;
2381  }
2382  }
2383 }
2384 void PM_EndDrift(void){
2385  pm->ps->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 0;
2386  if(pm->ps->lockedTarget > 0){
2387  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer){pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 0;}
2388  }
2389 }
2390 void PM_StopDrift(void){
2391  if(pm->ps->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] == 1){PM_EndDrift();}
2392 }
2393 void PM_SyncMelee(void){
2394  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer){
2395  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags & usingZanzoken || pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags & usingZanzoken){return;}
2396  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_ATTACK1_HELD;
2397  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_ATTACK2_HELD;
2398  pm->ps->bitFlags |= usingMelee;
2399  pm->ps->bitFlags |= usingFlight;
2400  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isBlinking;
2401  pm->ps->timers[tmUpdateMelee] = 300;
2402  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmUpdateMelee] = 300;
2403  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags |= usingMelee;
2404  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags |= usingFlight;
2405  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags &= ~isBlinking;
2406  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->weaponstate = WEAPON_READY;
2407  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->stats[stMeleeState] == 0){
2408  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->pm_flags |= PMF_ATTACK1_HELD;
2409  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->pm_flags |= PMF_ATTACK2_HELD;
2410  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->lockedTarget = pm->ps->clientNum + 1;
2411  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->lockedPlayer = 0;
2412  }
2413  }
2414 }
2415 void PM_MeleeIdle(void){
2416  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] += pml.msec;
2417  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer){
2418  if(pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] > 1500 && pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmMeleeIdle] > 1500){
2419  pm->ps->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 2;
2420  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 2;
2421  }
2422  }
2423 }
2424 void PM_Melee(void){
2425  int meleeCharge,enemyState,state,option,damage,distance,animation,direction,entity;
2426  qboolean charging,movingForward,idleTime,enemyChanged,enemyDefense;
2427  qtime_t realRandom;
2428  trap_RealTime(&realRandom);
2429  if(pm->ps->persistant[PERS_TEAM] == TEAM_SPECTATOR || pm->ps->bitFlags & isStruggling || pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] < 0){return;}
2430  charging = (pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_CHARGING || pm->ps->weaponstate == WEAPON_ALTCHARGING) ? qtrue : qfalse;
2431  state = pm->ps->stats[stMeleeState];
2432  idleTime = qfalse;
2433  distance = 9000;
2434  pm->ps->timers[tmUpdateMelee] += pml.msec;
2435  // ===================
2436  // Setup
2437  // ===================
2438  if(pm->ps->lockedTarget > 0 && !charging){
2439  if(pm->ps->timers[tmUpdateMelee] >= 300){
2440  pm->ps->timers[tmUpdateMelee] = 0;
2441  }
2442  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingZanzoken){
2443  PM_StopMelee();
2444  return;
2445  }
2446  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer){
2447  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags & usingZanzoken){
2448  PM_StopMelee();
2449  return;
2450  }
2451  distance = Distance(pm->ps->origin,*(pm->ps->lockedPosition));
2452  if(!(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingMelee)){
2453  state = stMeleeInactive;
2454  if(pm->cmd.forwardmove > 0){state = stMeleeAggressing;}
2455  if(pm->cmd.forwardmove < 0){state = stMeleeDegressing;}
2456  }
2457  if((pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags & isDead) || (pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags & isUnconcious) || (pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags & isCrashed)){
2458  PM_StopMelee();
2459  PM_StopLockon();
2460  return;
2461  }
2462  if(state != stMeleeIdle){pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] = 0;}
2463  if(distance > 64 && pm->ps->bitFlags & usingMelee){PM_StopMelee();}
2464  }
2465  }
2466  else{
2467  PM_StopMelee();
2468  return;
2469  }
2470  damage = 0;
2471  animation = pm->ps->bitFlags & usingMelee ? ANIM_FLY_IDLE : 0;
2472  meleeCharge = pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeCharge];
2473  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer){
2474  enemyState = pm->ps->lockedPlayer->stats[stMeleeState];
2475  enemyDefense = enemyState == stMeleeUsingEvade || enemyState == stMeleeUsingBlock ? qtrue : qfalse;
2476  }
2477  // ===================
2478  // Melee Logic
2479  // ===================
2480  if(distance <= 64 && !pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze]){
2481  // Preparation
2482  PM_CheckDrift();
2483  if(state != stMeleeStartAttack && state != stMeleeUsingSpeed){PM_StopDrift();}
2484  // Breakers
2485  if(pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeBreakerWait]){
2486  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeBreakerWait] -= pml.msec;
2487  if(pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeBreakerWait] < 0){pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeBreakerWait] = 0;}
2488  }
2489  if(pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeBreaker]){
2490  damage = (pm->ps->powerLevel[plCurrent] * 0.05) * pm->ps->baseStats[stMeleeAttack];
2491  if(pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeBreaker] > 0){
2492  state = stMeleeUsingChargeBreaker;
2493  if(enemyState == stMeleeUsingSpeed){
2494  //PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_BREAKER_BACKFIRE);
2495  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 950;
2496  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] = damage;
2497  state = stMeleeIdle;
2498  }
2499  else if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmMeleeBreaker]){
2500  //PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_BREAKER_CLASH);
2501  PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_KNOCKBACK);
2502  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 500;
2503  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] = -480;
2504  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmFreeze] = 500;
2505  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmMeleeIdle] = -480;
2506  }
2507  else if(enemyState != stMeleeUsingEvade){
2508  PM_EndDrift();
2509  PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_BREAKER);
2510  enemyState = stMeleeIdle;
2511  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 100;
2512  pm->ps->powerLevel[plHealthPool] += damage * 0.5;
2513  pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximumPool] += damage * 0.3;
2514  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerLevel[plDamageFromMelee] = damage;
2515  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmFreeze] = 500;
2516  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmMeleeCharge] = 0;
2517  }
2518  }
2519  else{
2520  state = stMeleeUsingSpeedBreaker;
2521  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmMeleeCharge]){
2522  //PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_BREAKER_BACKFIRE);
2523  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 300;
2524  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmMeleeCharge] = 1000;
2525  state = stMeleeIdle;
2526  }
2527  else if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmMeleeBreaker]){
2528  //PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_CLASH);
2529  PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_KNOCKBACK);
2530  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 500;
2531  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] = -480;
2532  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmFreeze] = 500;
2533  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmMeleeIdle] = -480;
2534  }
2535  else if(enemyState != stMeleeUsingBlock){
2536  PM_EndDrift();
2537  PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_BREAKER);
2538  enemyState = stMeleeIdle;
2539  pm->ps->powerLevel[plHealthPool] += damage * 0.5;
2540  pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximumPool] += damage * 0.3;
2541  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerLevel[plDamageFromMelee] = damage;
2542  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 100;
2543  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmFreeze] = 500;
2544  }
2545  }
2546  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeBreaker] = 0;
2547  }
2548  // Power Melee / Charge Breaker
2549  else if(state == stMeleeChargingPower || state == stMeleeStartPower || pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ALT_ATTACK){
2550  if((state == stMeleeChargingPower || state == stMeleeStartPower) && (!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ALT_ATTACK) || meleeCharge >= 550)){
2551  if(meleeCharge >= 550){
2552  damage = 0;
2553  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 1000;
2554  PM_EndDrift();
2555  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.05;
2556  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmMeleeCharge] > 50){
2557  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeIdle] = -480;
2558  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmMeleeIdle] = -480;
2559  PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_KNOCKBACK);
2560  //PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_CLASH);
2561  PM_StopMelee();
2562  }
2563  else if(enemyState != stMeleeUsingEvade){
2564  damage = (pm->ps->powerLevel[plCurrent] * 0.15) * pm->ps->baseStats[stMeleeAttack];
2565  if(enemyState == stMeleeUsingBlock){damage *= 0.3;}
2566  if(state != stMeleeStartPower){PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_KNOCKBACK);}
2567  }
2568  else{
2569  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] = damage * 0.8;
2570  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] = damage * 0.4;
2571  }
2572  if(enemyState != stMeleeUsingBlock && enemyState != stMeleeUsingEvade){
2573  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerups[PW_KNOCKBACK_SPEED] = (pm->ps->powerLevel[plCurrent] / 21.84) + pm->ps->baseStats[stKnockbackPower];
2574  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmKnockback]){pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerups[PW_KNOCKBACK_SPEED] *= 2;}
2575  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost){
2576  damage *= 1.5;
2577  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerups[PW_KNOCKBACK_SPEED] *= 1.8;
2578  }
2579  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmKnockback] = 5000;
2580  PM_StopMelee();
2581  }
2582  pm->ps->powerLevel[plHealthPool] += damage;
2583  pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximumPool] += damage * 0.8;
2584  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerLevel[plDamageFromMelee] += damage;
2585  state = stMeleeUsingPower;
2586  meleeCharge = 0;
2587  }
2588  else if(!pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeBreakerWait]){
2589  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeBreaker] = 1;
2590  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeBreakerWait] = 500;
2591  pm->ps->stats[stAnimState] = (Q_random(&realRandom.tm_sec) * 5)+1;
2592  meleeCharge = 0;
2593  }
2594  else{meleeCharge = 0;}
2595  }
2596  else{
2597  direction = 5;
2598  if(pm->cmd.upmove > 0){direction = 1;}
2599  else if(pm->cmd.upmove < 0){direction = 2;}
2600  else if(pm->cmd.rightmove > 0){direction = 3;}
2601  else if(pm->cmd.rightmove < 0){direction = 4;}
2602  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->knockBackDirection = direction;
2603  state = stMeleeChargingPower;
2604  meleeCharge += pml.msec;
2605  if(meleeCharge >= 550){meleeCharge = 550;}
2606  }
2607  }
2608  // Stun Melee / Speed Breaker
2609  else if(state == stMeleeChargingStun || pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK){
2610  if(state == stMeleeChargingStun && (!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK) || meleeCharge >= 1000)){
2611  if(!pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeBreakerWait]){
2612  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeBreaker] = -1;
2613  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeBreakerWait] = 500;
2614  pm->ps->stats[stAnimState] = (Q_random(&realRandom.tm_sec) * 5)+1;
2615  meleeCharge = 0;
2616  }
2617  else{meleeCharge = 0;}
2618  }
2619  else{
2620  state = stMeleeChargingStun;
2621  meleeCharge += pml.msec;
2622  if(meleeCharge >= 1000){meleeCharge = 1000;}
2623  }
2624  }
2625  // Start / Speed Melee / Evade
2626  else if(pm->cmd.forwardmove){
2627  if(pm->cmd.forwardmove > 0){
2628  meleeCharge = 0;
2629  // Start Sequence
2630  if(!(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingMelee) && !(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags & usingMelee) &&
2631  !(pm->ps->bitFlags & isStruggling) && !(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags & isStruggling)){
2632  state = stMeleeStartAttack;
2633  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 1000;
2634  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmFreeze] = 1000;
2635  PM_SyncMelee();
2636  if(enemyState == stMeleeAggressing){
2637  pm->ps->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 0;
2638  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 0;
2639  PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_BREAKER);
2640  enemyState = stMeleeStartAttack;
2641  }
2642  else if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags & usingBlock || enemyState == stMeleeDegressing){
2643  pm->ps->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 1;
2644  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 2;
2645  enemyState = stMeleeStartDodge;
2646  PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_BREAKER);
2647  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] = pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.10;
2648  }
2649  else{
2650  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmKnockback]){
2651  state = stMeleeChargingPower;
2652  meleeCharge = 750;
2653  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 300;
2654  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmFreeze] = 300;
2655  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->knockBackDirection = 2;
2656  }
2657  else if(pm->ps->timers[tmBoost] > 2500){
2658  state = stMeleeStartPower;
2659  enemyState = stMeleeStartHit;
2660  meleeCharge = 750;
2661  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 1000;
2662  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmFreeze] = 1000;
2663  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->knockBackDirection = 5;
2664  PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_KNOCKBACK);
2665  }
2666  else{
2667  pm->ps->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 1;
2668  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 2;
2669  if(pm->ps->timers[tmBoost]){
2670  pm->ps->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 1;
2671  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerups[PW_DRIFTING] = 2;
2672  pm->ps->timers[tmFreeze] = 0;
2673  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmFreeze] = 0;
2674  state = stMeleeUsingSpeed;
2675  }
2676  else{
2677  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmFreeze] = 2500;
2678  enemyState = stMeleeStartHit;
2679  PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_KNOCKBACK);
2680  }
2681  }
2682  }
2683  }
2684  // Speed Melee
2685  else{
2686  damage = (pm->ps->powerLevel[plFatigue] * 0.013) * pm->ps->baseStats[stMeleeAttack];
2687  if(pm->ps->powerups[PW_DRIFTING]==1){damage *= 1.2;}
2688  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost){damage *= 1.5;}
2689  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeSpeed] += pml.msec;
2690  if(pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeSpeed] >= 100){
2691  if(enemyState == stMeleeUsingBlock){damage *= 0.2;}
2692  if(enemyState == stMeleeUsingEvade){
2693  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += damage * 0.5;
2694  damage = 0;
2695  }
2696  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerLevel[plHealth] > damage){
2697  pm->ps->powerLevel[plHealthPool] += damage * 0.7;
2698  pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximumPool] += damage * 0.5;
2699  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerLevel[plDamageFromMelee] += damage;
2700  }
2701  else{
2702  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += damage;
2703  }
2704  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeSpeed] -= 100;
2705  }
2706  state = stMeleeUsingSpeed;
2707  }
2708  }
2709  // Evade
2710  else{
2711  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmFreeze] > 0 || enemyDefense){PM_StopMelee();}
2712  else{state = stMeleeUsingEvade;}
2713  PM_MeleeIdle();
2714  }
2715  }
2716  // Blocking
2717  else if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBlock){
2718  meleeCharge = 0;
2719  state = stMeleeUsingBlock;
2720  PM_MeleeIdle();
2721  if(enemyDefense){PM_StopMelee();}
2722  }
2723  else{
2724  meleeCharge = 0;
2725  state = stMeleeIdle;
2726  PM_MeleeIdle();
2727  }
2728  }
2729  // ===========================
2730  // Melee Animations / Events
2731  // ===========================
2732  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer){
2733  enemyChanged = pm->ps->lockedPlayer->stats[stMeleeState] == enemyState ? qfalse : qtrue;
2734  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->lockedTarget != pm->ps->clientNum + 1 && !enemyChanged){enemyState = -1;}
2735  if((pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmKnockback] || pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmFreeze]) && !enemyChanged){enemyState = -1;}
2736  }
2737  if(state){
2738  if(state == stMeleeStartAttack){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_ATTACK1;}
2739  if(state == stMeleeStartHit){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_HIT1;}
2740  if(state == stMeleeStartDodge){animation = ANIM_BLOCK;}
2741  if(state == stMeleeUsingSpeed || enemyState == stMeleeUsingSpeed){
2742  if(state == stMeleeUsingSpeed){
2743  animation = ANIM_SPEED_MELEE_ATTACK;
2744  if(enemyState != stMeleeUsingEvade){PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_SPEED);}
2745  }
2746  else{
2747  if(state == stMeleeUsingBlock){animation = ANIM_SPEED_MELEE_BLOCK;}
2748  else if(state == stMeleeUsingEvade){
2749  animation = ANIM_SPEED_MELEE_DODGE;
2750  PM_AddEvent(EV_MELEE_MISS);
2751  }
2752  else if(state != stMeleeChargingPower && state != stMeleeChargingStun){animation = ANIM_SPEED_MELEE_HIT;}
2753  }
2754  }
2755  if(state == stMeleeUsingPower || state == stMeleeStartPower || enemyState == stMeleeUsingPower || enemyState == stMeleeStartPower){
2756  if(state == stMeleeUsingPower || state == stMeleeStartPower){
2757  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer){
2758  direction = pm->ps->lockedPlayer->knockBackDirection;
2759  if(direction == 1){animation = ANIM_POWER_MELEE_4_HIT;}
2760  else if(direction == 2){animation = ANIM_POWER_MELEE_2_HIT;}
2761  else if(direction == 3){animation = ANIM_POWER_MELEE_6_HIT;}
2762  else if(direction == 4){animation = ANIM_POWER_MELEE_5_HIT;}
2763  else if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost && state != stMeleeStartPower){animation = ANIM_POWER_MELEE_3_HIT;}
2764  else{animation = ANIM_POWER_MELEE_1_HIT;}
2765  }
2766  }
2767  else{
2768  if(state == stMeleeUsingBlock){animation = ANIM_BLOCK;}
2769  if(state == stMeleeStartPower){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_HIT1;}
2770  }
2771  }
2772  if(state == stMeleeUsingStun || enemyState == stMeleeUsingStun){
2773  if(state == stMeleeUsingStun){
2774  animation = ANIM_POWER_MELEE_3_HIT;
2775  }
2776  else{
2777  if(state == stMeleeUsingBlock){animation = ANIM_BLOCK;}
2778  else{animation = ANIM_STUNNED_MELEE;}
2779  }
2780  }
2781  if(state == stMeleeChargingPower){
2782  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer){
2783  direction = pm->ps->lockedPlayer->knockBackDirection;
2784  if(direction == 1){animation = ANIM_POWER_MELEE_4_CHARGE;}
2785  else if(direction == 2){animation = ANIM_POWER_MELEE_2_CHARGE;}
2786  else if(direction == 3){animation = ANIM_POWER_MELEE_6_CHARGE;}
2787  else if(direction == 4){animation = ANIM_POWER_MELEE_5_CHARGE;}
2788  else if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost){animation = ANIM_POWER_MELEE_3_CHARGE;}
2789  else{animation = ANIM_POWER_MELEE_1_CHARGE;}
2790  }
2791  }
2792  if(state == stMeleeChargingStun){
2793  animation = ANIM_POWER_MELEE_1_CHARGE;
2794  }
2795  if(state == stMeleeUsingSpeedBreaker || enemyState == stMeleeUsingSpeedBreaker || state == stMeleeUsingChargeBreaker || enemyState == stMeleeUsingChargeBreaker){
2796  int breaker = pm->ps->stats[stAnimState];
2797  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer){
2798  int enemyBreaker = pm->ps->lockedPlayer->stats[stAnimState];
2799  if(state == stMeleeUsingSpeedBreaker || state == stMeleeUsingChargeBreaker){
2800  if(breaker == 1){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_ATTACK1;}
2801  else if(breaker == 2){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_ATTACK2;}
2802  else if(breaker == 3){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_ATTACK3;}
2803  else if(breaker == 4){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_ATTACK4;}
2804  else if(breaker == 5){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_ATTACK5;}
2805  else if(breaker == 6){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_ATTACK6;}
2806  }
2807  else{
2808  if(enemyBreaker == 1){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_HIT1;}
2809  else if(enemyBreaker == 2){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_HIT2;}
2810  else if(enemyBreaker == 3){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_HIT3;}
2811  else if(enemyBreaker == 4){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_HIT4;}
2812  else if(enemyBreaker == 5){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_HIT5;}
2813  else if(enemyBreaker == 6){animation = ANIM_BREAKER_MELEE_HIT6;}
2814  }
2815  }
2816  }
2817  }
2818  if(animation){PM_ContinueLegsAnim(animation);}
2819  if(enemyState != -1){
2820  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer){pm->ps->lockedPlayer->stats[stMeleeState] = enemyState;}
2821  }
2822  pm->ps->stats[stMeleeState] = state;
2823  pm->ps->timers[tmMeleeCharge] = meleeCharge;
2824  if(distance <= 64){pm->cmd.rightmove = 0;}
2825 }
2826 
2827 /*
2828 ===============
2829 CG_WeaponSelectable
2830 ===============
2831 */
2832 qboolean PM_WeaponSelectable( int i ) {
2833  qboolean usable;
2834  usable = qfalse;
2835  if ( ! (pm->ps->stats[ stSkills ] & ( 1 << i ) ) ) {
2836  return qfalse;
2837  }
2838 
2839  if(i == 1 && (pm->ps->powerups[PW_SKILLS] & USABLE_SKILL1)){usable = qtrue;}
2840  if(i == 2 && (pm->ps->powerups[PW_SKILLS] & USABLE_SKILL2)){usable = qtrue;}
2841  if(i == 3 && (pm->ps->powerups[PW_SKILLS] & USABLE_SKILL3)){usable = qtrue;}
2842  if(i == 4 && (pm->ps->powerups[PW_SKILLS] & USABLE_SKILL4)){usable = qtrue;}
2843  if(i == 5 && (pm->ps->powerups[PW_SKILLS] & USABLE_SKILL5)){usable = qtrue;}
2844  if(i == 6 && (pm->ps->powerups[PW_SKILLS] & USABLE_SKILL6)){usable = qtrue;}
2845 
2846  if(!usable){return qfalse;}
2847  return qtrue;
2848 }
2849 
2850 /*==============
2851 PM_Weapon
2852 Generates weapon events and modifes the weapon counter
2853 ==============*/
2854 void PM_CheckWeaponSelectionMode(void)
2855 {
2856  int weaponIndex;
2857  int originalWeaponIndex = pm->cmd.weapon;
2858  int offset = 0;
2859  if(pm->cmd.weaponSelectionMode == 1){offset = -1;}
2860  if(pm->cmd.weaponSelectionMode == 2){offset = 1;}
2861  for(weaponIndex = 0;weaponIndex < 16;weaponIndex++){
2862  pm->cmd.weapon += offset;
2863  if(pm->cmd.weapon == 0){pm->cmd.weapon = 15;}
2864  if(pm->cmd.weapon == 16){pm->cmd.weapon = 0;}
2865  if(PM_WeaponSelectable(pm->cmd.weapon)){break;}
2866  }
2867  if(weaponIndex == 16){pm->cmd.weapon = originalWeaponIndex;}
2868 }
2869 
2870 void PM_WeaponRelease(void){
2871  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & isStruggling){return;}
2872  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & isGuiding){
2873  PM_AddEvent(EV_DETONATE_WEAPON);
2874  pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isGuiding;
2875  }
2876  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_READY;
2877  pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentPrimary] = 0;
2878  pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentSecondary] = 0;
2879 }
2880 void PM_Weapon(void){
2881  int *weaponInfo;
2882  int *alt_weaponInfo;
2883  int chargeRate;
2884  int costPrimary,costSecondary;
2885  int i;
2886  float energyScale;
2887  qboolean usable;
2888  float powerScale = ((float)pm->ps->powerLevel[plCurrent] / 1000.0) * pm->ps->baseStats[stEnergyAttack];
2889  pm->ps->currentSkill[WPSTAT_CHANGED] = 0;
2890  PM_CheckWeaponSelectionMode();
2891  if(!PM_WeaponSelectable(pm->cmd.weapon)) {
2892  pm->ps->currentSkill[WPSTAT_CHANGED] = -1;
2893  return;
2894  }
2895  if(pm->ps->weaponstate != WEAPON_GUIDING){pm->ps->bitFlags &= ~isGuiding;}
2896  if(pm->ps->persistant[PERS_TEAM] == TEAM_SPECTATOR){return;}
2897  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & isStruggling || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar
2898  || pm->ps->bitFlags & isPreparing || pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] > 1 || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingMelee
2899  || (pm->ps->lockedPlayer && pm->ps->lockedTarget && pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmKnockback] && VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity))){
2900  if(pm->ps->timers[tmTransform] > 1 || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingMelee){PM_WeaponRelease();}
2901  return;
2902  }
2903  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & isStruggling){return;}
2904  if(pm->ps->weapon == WP_NONE || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingMelee){
2905  PM_WeaponRelease();
2906  return;
2907  }
2908  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer){
2909  if(pm->ps->lockedTarget && pm->ps->lockedPlayer->timers[tmKnockback] && VectorLength(pm->ps->velocity)){return;}
2910  }
2911  if(pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_ATTACK1_HELD){
2912  if(!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK)){pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_ATTACK1_HELD;}
2913  else{return;}
2914  }
2915  if(pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_ATTACK2_HELD){
2916  if(!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ALT_ATTACK)){pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_ATTACK2_HELD;}
2917  else{return;}
2918  }
2919  // Retrieve our weapon's settings
2920  weaponInfo = pm->ps->currentSkill;
2921  if(weaponInfo[WPSTAT_BITFLAGS] & WPF_ALTWEAPONPRESENT){
2922  alt_weaponInfo = &weaponInfo[WPSTAT_ALT_POWER];
2923  } else{
2924  alt_weaponInfo = weaponInfo; // Keep both sets the same.
2925  if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ALT_ATTACK) { // ifwe have no altfire,
2926  pm->cmd.buttons &= ~BUTTON_ALT_ATTACK; // override ALT_ATTACK to ATTACK.
2927  pm->cmd.buttons |= BUTTON_ATTACK;
2928  }
2929  }
2930 
2931  if(weaponInfo[WPSTAT_NUMCHECK] != pm->ps->weapon){ return; }
2932  costPrimary = weaponInfo[WPSTAT_POWERLEVELCOST];
2933  costSecondary = alt_weaponInfo[WPSTAT_POWERLEVELCOST];
2934  energyScale = (float)pm->ps->powerLevel[plCurrent] / (float)pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum];
2935  switch(pm->ps->weaponstate){
2936  case WEAPON_READY:
2937  case WEAPON_DROPPING:
2938  case WEAPON_RAISING:
2939  case WEAPON_COOLING:
2940  pm->ps->timers[tmAttackLife] = 0;
2941  if(pm->ps->weaponTime > 0){
2942  pm->ps->weaponTime -= pml.msec;
2943  }
2944 
2945  if(pm->ps->weaponTime > 0){
2946  break;
2947  } else{
2948  pm->ps->weaponTime = 0;
2949  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_READY;
2950  }
2951  if(pm->ps->weapon == pm->cmd.weapon){
2952  if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK) {
2953  if(weaponInfo[WPSTAT_BITFLAGS] & WPF_NEEDSCHARGE){
2954  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_CHARGING;
2955  PM_StartTorsoAnim(ANIM_KI_ATTACK1_PREPARE + (pm->ps->weapon - 1) * 2 );
2956  break;
2957  }
2958  pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentPrimary] = 100;
2959  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += costPrimary * pm->ps->baseStats[stEnergyAttackCost] * energyScale;
2960  if(weaponInfo[WPSTAT_BITFLAGS] & WPF_CONTINUOUS){
2961  PM_AddEvent(EV_FIRE_WEAPON );
2962  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_FIRING;
2963  } else{
2964  PM_AddEvent(EV_FIRE_WEAPON);
2965  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_COOLING;
2966  pm->ps->weaponTime += weaponInfo[WPSTAT_COOLTIME];
2967  }
2968  PM_StartTorsoAnim(ANIM_KI_ATTACK1_FIRE + (pm->ps->weapon - 1) * 2 );
2969  break;
2970  }
2971  if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ALT_ATTACK){
2972  if(alt_weaponInfo[WPSTAT_BITFLAGS] & WPF_NEEDSCHARGE){
2973  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_ALTCHARGING;
2974  PM_StartTorsoAnim(ANIM_KI_ATTACK1_ALT_PREPARE + (pm->ps->weapon - 1) * 2 );
2975  break;
2976  }
2977  pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentSecondary] = 100;
2978  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += costSecondary * pm->ps->baseStats[stEnergyAttackCost] * energyScale;
2979  if(alt_weaponInfo[WPSTAT_BITFLAGS] & WPF_CONTINUOUS){
2980  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_ALTFIRING;
2981  PM_AddEvent(EV_ALTFIRE_WEAPON);
2982  }
2983  else{
2984  PM_AddEvent(EV_ALTFIRE_WEAPON);
2985  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_COOLING;
2986  pm->ps->weaponTime += alt_weaponInfo[WPSTAT_COOLTIME];
2987  }
2988  PM_StartTorsoAnim(ANIM_KI_ATTACK1_ALT_FIRE + (pm->ps->weapon - 1) * 2 );
2989  break;
2990  }
2991  }
2992  else{
2993  PM_BeginWeaponChange(pm->cmd.weapon);
2994  }
2995  break;
2996  case WEAPON_GUIDING:
2997  if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & isStruggling) && pm->ps->timers[tmAttackLife] > 2000){
2998  PM_AddEvent(EV_DETONATE_WEAPON);
2999  pm->ps->weaponTime += weaponInfo[WPSTAT_COOLTIME];
3000  PM_StartTorsoAnim(ANIM_IDLE);
3001  }
3002  pm->ps->timers[tmAttackLife] += pml.msec;
3003  pm->ps->timers[tmImpede] = 100;
3004  break;
3005  case WEAPON_ALTGUIDING:
3006  if(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ALT_ATTACK && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & isStruggling) && pm->ps->timers[tmAttackLife] > 2000){
3007  PM_AddEvent(EV_DETONATE_WEAPON);
3008  pm->ps->weaponTime += alt_weaponInfo[WPSTAT_COOLTIME];
3009  PM_StartTorsoAnim(ANIM_IDLE);
3010  }
3011  pm->ps->timers[tmAttackLife] += pml.msec;
3012  pm->ps->timers[tmImpede] = 100;
3013  break;
3014  case WEAPON_CHARGING:
3015  chargeRate = (pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost) ? 2 : 1;
3016  pm->ps->timers[tmAttack1] += pml.msec;
3017  pm->ps->timers[tmImpede] = weaponInfo[WPSTAT_RESTRICT_MOVEMENT];
3018  pm->ps->attackPower = weaponInfo[WPSTAT_POWER] * ((float)pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentPrimary] / 100.0f) * powerScale;
3019  if(pm->ps->timers[tmAttack1] >= weaponInfo[WPSTAT_CHRGTIME]){
3020  pm->ps->timers[tmAttack1] -= weaponInfo[WPSTAT_CHRGTIME];
3021  if(pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentPrimary] < 100){
3022  if(pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentPrimary] == 0 && pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost){
3023  pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentPrimary] = 25;
3024  costPrimary *= 40;
3025  }
3026  pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentPrimary] += chargeRate;
3027  if(pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentPrimary] > 100){
3028  pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentPrimary] = 100;
3029  }
3030  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += costPrimary * pm->ps->baseStats[stEnergyAttackCost] * energyScale;
3031  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseHealth] += weaponInfo[WPSTAT_HEALTHCOST] * ((float)pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.0001) * pm->ps->baseStats[stEnergyAttackCost];
3032  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseMaximum] += weaponInfo[WPSTAT_MAXIMUMCOST] * ((float)pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.0001) * pm->ps->baseStats[stEnergyAttackCost];
3033  }
3034  }
3035  if(!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK)) {
3036  pm->ps->timers[tmAttack1] = 0;
3037  if(weaponInfo[WPSTAT_BITFLAGS] & WPF_READY){
3038  weaponInfo[WPSTAT_BITFLAGS] &= ~WPF_READY;
3039  if(weaponInfo[WPSTAT_BITFLAGS] & WPF_GUIDED){
3040  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_GUIDING;
3041  pm->ps->bitFlags |= isGuiding;
3042  } else{
3043  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_COOLING;
3044  pm->ps->weaponTime += weaponInfo[WPSTAT_COOLTIME];
3045  }
3046  PM_AddEvent(EV_FIRE_WEAPON);
3047  PM_StartTorsoAnim(ANIM_KI_ATTACK1_FIRE + (pm->ps->weapon - 1) * 2 );
3048  }
3049  else{
3050  pm->ps->weaponTime = 0;
3051  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_READY;
3052  pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentPrimary] = 0;
3053  PM_StartTorsoAnim(ANIM_IDLE);
3054  }
3055  }
3056  break;
3057  case WEAPON_ALTCHARGING:
3058  chargeRate = (pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost) ? 2 : 1;
3059  pm->ps->timers[tmAttack2] += pml.msec;
3060  pm->ps->timers[tmImpede] = weaponInfo[WPSTAT_ALT_RESTRICT_MOVEMENT];
3061  pm->ps->attackPower = weaponInfo[WPSTAT_ALT_POWER] * ((float)pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentSecondary] / 100.0f) * powerScale;
3062  if(pm->ps->timers[tmAttack2] >= weaponInfo[WPSTAT_ALT_CHRGTIME]){
3063  pm->ps->timers[tmAttack2] -= weaponInfo[WPSTAT_ALT_CHRGTIME];
3064  if(pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentSecondary] < 100){
3065  if(pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentPrimary] == 0 && pm->ps->bitFlags & usingBoost){
3066  pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentPrimary] = 25;
3067  costSecondary *= 25;
3068  }
3069  pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentSecondary] += chargeRate;
3070  if(pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentSecondary] > 100){
3071  pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentSecondary] = 100;
3072  }
3073  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += costSecondary * pm->ps->baseStats[stEnergyAttackCost] * energyScale;
3074  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseHealth] += weaponInfo[WPSTAT_ALT_HEALTHCOST] * ((float)pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.0001);
3075  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseMaximum] += weaponInfo[WPSTAT_ALT_MAXIMUMCOST] * ((float)pm->ps->powerLevel[plMaximum] * 0.0001);
3076  }
3077  }
3078  if(!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ALT_ATTACK)) {
3079  if(alt_weaponInfo[WPSTAT_BITFLAGS] & WPF_READY){
3080  alt_weaponInfo[WPSTAT_BITFLAGS] &= ~WPF_READY;
3081  if(alt_weaponInfo[WPSTAT_BITFLAGS] & WPF_GUIDED){
3082  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_ALTGUIDING;
3083  pm->ps->bitFlags |= isGuiding;
3084  } else{

3086  pm->ps->weaponTime += alt_weaponInfo[WPSTAT_COOLTIME];
3087  }

3093  pm->ps->stats[stChargePercentSecondary] = 0;
3094  PM_StartTorsoAnim(ANIM_IDLE );
3095  }
3096  }

3098  case WEAPON_FIRING:
3099  if(!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ATTACK)){
3100  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_COOLING;
3101  pm->ps->weaponTime += weaponInfo[WPSTAT_COOLTIME];
3102  PM_StartTorsoAnim(ANIM_IDLE );
3103  break;
3104  }
3105  pm->ps->weaponTime += pml.msec;
3106  while(pm->ps->weaponTime > 100){
3107  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += costPrimary * pm->ps->baseStats[stEnergyAttackCost] * energyScale;
3108  }
3109  break;
3110  case WEAPON_ALTFIRING:
3111  if(!(pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_ALT_ATTACK)){
3112  pm->ps->weaponstate = WEAPON_COOLING;
3113  pm->ps->weaponTime += alt_weaponInfo[WPSTAT_COOLTIME];
3114  PM_StartTorsoAnim(ANIM_IDLE );
3115  break;
3116  }
3117  pm->ps->weaponTime += pml.msec;
3118  while(pm->ps->weaponTime > 100){
3119  pm->ps->powerLevel[plUseFatigue] += costSecondary * pm->ps->baseStats[stEnergyAttackCost] * energyScale;
3120  }
3121  break;
3122  default:
3123  break;
3124  }
3125 }

3186 void PM_CheckLockon(void){
3187  int entityNum = -1;
3188  if(!(pm->ps->options & canLockon)){
3189  PM_StopLockon();
3190  return;
3191  }
3192  if(pm->ps->lockedTarget > 0){
3193  if(pm->ps->lockedPlayer){
3194  pm->ps->lockonData[lkPowerCurrent] = pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerLevel[plCurrent];
3195  pm->ps->lockonData[lkPowerHealth] = pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerLevel[plHealth];
3196  pm->ps->lockonData[lkPowerMaximum] = pm->ps->lockedPlayer->powerLevel[plMaximum];
3197  pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags |= isTargeted;
3198  }
3199  }
3200  if((pm->cmd.buttons & BUTTON_GESTURE) && pm->ps->stats[stMeleeState] == 0 && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar)){
3201  if(pm->ps->pm_flags & PMF_LOCK_HELD){return;}
3202  pm->ps->pm_flags |= PMF_LOCK_HELD;
3203  if(pm->ps->lockedTarget>0){
3204  PM_StopLockon();
3205  return;
3206  }
3207  entityNum = PM_VerifyTrace(250);
3208  if(entityNum == -1){ return; }
3209  PM_AddEvent(EV_LOCKON_START);
3210  pm->ps->lockedTarget = entityNum+1;
3211  pm->ps->timers[tmLockon] = 0;
3212  pm->ps->lockonData[lkLastLockedPlayer] = -1;
3213  }
3214  else{
3215  pm->ps->pm_flags &= ~PMF_LOCK_HELD;
3216  }
3217  if(pm->ps->lockonData[lkLastLockedPlayer] != -1){
3218  pm->ps->timers[tmLockon] += pml.msec;
3219  if(pm->ps->timers[tmLockon] < 3000){
3220  entityNum = PM_VerifyTrace(2500);
3221  if(entityNum > -1 && pm->ps->lockedPlayer && !(pm->ps->lockedPlayer->bitFlags & usingZanzoken)){
3222  if(entityNum == pm->ps->lockonData[lkLastLockedPlayer]){
3223  pm->ps->lockonData[lkLastLockedPlayer] = -1;
3224  pm->ps->lockedTarget = entityNum+1;
3225  pm->ps->timers[tmLockon] = 0;
3226  pm->ps->lockedPlayer = 0;
3227  PM_AddEvent(EV_LOCKON_RESTART);
3228  }
3229  }
3230  }
3231  else {
3232  PM_StopLockon();
3233  }
3234  }
3235 }

3270 void PM_UpdateViewAngles(playerState_t *ps, const usercmd_t *cmd){
3271  short temp;
3272  int i;
3273  int roll = 0;
3274  float oldCmdAngle;
3275  vec3_t offset_angles;
3276  vec4_t quatOrient;
3277  vec4_t quatRot;
3278  vec4_t quatResult;
3279  vec3_t new_angles;
3280  float pitchNorm;
3281  if(ps->pm_type == PM_INTERMISSION || ps->pm_type == PM_SPINTERMISSION) {
3282  return;
3283  }
3284  //Com_Printf("Testing : %f, %f, %f\n",SHORT2ANGLE(ps->delta_angles[0]),SHORT2ANGLE(ps->delta_angles[1]),SHORT2ANGLE(ps->delta_angles[2]));
3285  //VectorCopy(pml.gravityNormal,pml.up);
3286  //VectorSubtract(pm->ps->delta_angles,pml.gravityNormal,pm->ps->delta_angles);
3287  //VectorNormalize2(pm->ps->delta_angles,pml.gravityNormal);
3288  if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingZanzoken || pm->ps->lockedTarget > 0){
3289  AngleVectors(pm->ps->viewangles,pml.forward,NULL,NULL);
3290  }
3291  /*AnglesToAxis( const vec3_t angles, vec3_t axis[3] );
3292  Com_Printf("View Angles : %f, %f, %f\n",pm->ps->viewangles[0],pm->ps->viewangles[1],pm->ps->viewangles[2]);
3293  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
3294  ps->delta_angles[i] = ANGLE2SHORT(fixedAngles[i]) - cmd->angles[i];
3295  }*/
3296  if(pm->ps->options & pointGravity){
3297  VectorSubtract(pm->ps->origin,pml.gravityPoint,pml.gravityDirection);
3298  VectorNormalize2(pml.gravityDirection,pml.gravityNormal);
3299  }
3300  else{
3301  pml.gravityNormal[0] = 0;
3302  pml.gravityNormal[1] = 0;
3303  pml.gravityNormal[2] = 1;
3304  }
3305  VectorScale(pml.gravityNormal,pm->ps->gravity[2],pml.gravityDirection);
3306  if((pm->ps->lockedTarget > 0) && !(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingAlter) && *ps->lockedPosition){
3307  vec3_t dir;
3308  vec3_t angles;
3309  VectorSubtract(*(ps->lockedPosition),ps->origin,dir);
3310  vectoangles(dir,angles);
3311 
3312  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
3313  ps->delta_angles[i] = ANGLE2SHORT(angles[i]) - cmd->angles[i];
3314  }
3315  }
3316  else if(pm->ps->bitFlags & usingFlight && (pm->ps->options & advancedFlight || pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar)){
3317  int base = pm->ps->bitFlags & usingSoar ? 50 : 28;
3318  if(cmd->buttons & BUTTON_ROLL_LEFT){
3319  roll -= base * (pml.msec / 200.0f);
3320  }
3321  if(cmd->buttons & BUTTON_ROLL_RIGHT) {
3322  roll += base * (pml.msec / 200.0f);
3323  }
3324  for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
3325  // Get the offsets for the angles
3326  oldCmdAngle = ps->viewangles[i] - SHORT2ANGLE(ps->delta_angles[i]);
3327  offset_angles[i] = AngleNormalize180(SHORT2ANGLE(cmd->angles[i]) - oldCmdAngle);
3328  }
3329  // Don't forget to add our customized roll function if
3330  // we're not guiding a weapon!
3331  if(!(pm->ps->bitFlags & isGuiding)){
3332  offset_angles[ROLL] = AngleNormalize180(offset_angles[ROLL] + roll);
3333  }
3334 
3335  // There's a drifting problem with the quaternions' rounding, so when we DON'T change
3336  // our viewangles at all, we don't run through the quaternions to prevent drifting.
3337  // (As a bonus; this also means we won't be doing needless matrix manipulations.)
3338 
3339  if(((offset_angles[0] == 0) && (offset_angles[1] == 0)) && (offset_angles[2] == 0)) {
3340  return;
3341  }
3342  AnglesToQuat(ps->viewangles, quatOrient);
3343  AnglesToQuat(offset_angles, quatRot);
3344  QuatMul(quatOrient, quatRot, quatResult);
3345  QuatToAngles(quatResult, new_angles);
3346  // Try and compensate for the drifting problem.
3347  new_angles[PITCH] += 0.05f;
3348  // HACK: Because an exact pitch of -90 degrees STILL causes trouble troughout the
3349  // code due to 'bad mathematics', we give a slight nudge ifthis threatens
3350  // to happen. 2 degrees is not really noticeable, and is big enough to
3351  // compensate for round off errors leading to -90 degrees of pitch.
3352  // NOTE: For some reason the program 'auto-magically' prevents angles of 90 degree
3353  // pitch, by forcing you into a bit more yaw. Strange...
3354  AngleNormalize180(new_angles[PITCH]);
3355  if((new_angles[PITCH] < -89.0f)&& (new_angles[PITCH] > -91.0f)) {
3356  if(ps->viewangles[PITCH] < new_angles[PITCH]){
3357  new_angles[PITCH] += 2;
3358  } else{
3359  new_angles[PITCH] -= 2;
3360  }
3361  }
3362  // Correct the 3 delta_angles;
3363  if(i == ROLL && ps->viewangles[i] != 0) {
3364  ps->viewangles[i] = 0;
3365  ps->delta_angles[i] = 0 - cmd->angles[i];
3366  }
3367  for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
3368  ps->viewangles[i] = AngleNormalize180(new_angles[i]);
3369  ps->delta_angles[i] = ANGLE2SHORT(ps->viewangles[i]) - cmd->angles[i];
3370  }
3371  return;
3372  }
3373  else{
3374  ps->viewangles[ROLL] = 0;
3375  ps->delta_angles[ROLL] = 0;
3376  offset_angles[ROLL]= 0;
3377  }
3378  // We've been flying and we've inverted our pitch to a good amount upside down.
3379  // Cheat the view, by adjusting the yaw to 'swing around' and adjusting the pitch to match.
3380  pitchNorm = AngleNormalize180(ps->viewangles[PITCH]);
3381  if(pitchNorm > 100){
3382  ps->delta_angles[YAW] += ANGLE2SHORT(180);
3383  ps->delta_angles[PITCH] -= ANGLE2SHORT(pitchNorm);
3384  ps->delta_angles[PITCH] += ANGLE2SHORT(180 - pitchNorm);
3385  }
3386  if(pitchNorm < -100){
3387  ps->delta_angles[YAW] += ANGLE2SHORT(180);
3388  ps->delta_angles[PITCH] -= ANGLE2SHORT(pitchNorm);
3389  ps->delta_angles[PITCH] += ANGLE2SHORT(-180 - pitchNorm);
3390  }
3391  for (i=0 ; i<3 ; i++) {
3392  temp = cmd->angles[i] + ps->delta_angles[i];
3393  if(i == PITCH){
3394  if(pm->ps->lockedTarget <= 0){
3395  if(temp > 16000){
3396  ps->delta_angles[i] = 16000 - cmd->angles[i];
3397  temp = 16000;
3398  } else if(temp < -16000){
3399  ps->delta_angles[i] = -16000 - cmd->angles[i];
3400  temp = -16000;
3401  }
3402  }
3403 
3404  }
3405  ps->viewangles[i] = SHORT2ANGLE(temp);
3406  }
3407 }

3524 void Pmove(pmove_t *pmove){

3526  finalTime = pmove->cmd.serverTime;
3527  if(finalTime < pmove->ps->commandTime){return;}
3528  if(finalTime > pmove->ps->commandTime + 1000){
3529  pmove->ps->commandTime = finalTime - 1000;
3530  }
3531  pmove->ps->pmove_framecount = (pmove->ps->pmove_framecount+1) & ((1<<PS_PMOVEFRAMECOUNTBITS)-1);
3532  while(pmove->ps->commandTime != finalTime){
3533  int msec;
3534  msec = finalTime - pmove->ps->commandTime;
3535  if(pmove->pmove_fixed){
3536  if(msec > pmove->pmove_msec){
3537  msec = pmove->pmove_msec;
3538  }
3539  }
3540  else if(msec > 66){
3541  msec = 66;
3542  }
3543  pmove->cmd.serverTime = pmove->ps->commandTime + msec;
3544  PmoveSingle(pmove);
